GV01rv_hn07u:1: RV_7,001.01a agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir araṇyor hastacyutī janayanta praśastam
GV01rv_hn07u:3: RV_7,001.02a tam agnim aste vasavo ny ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutaś cit
GV01rv_hn07u:4: RV_7,001.02c dakṣāyyo yo dama āsa nityaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:5: RV_7,001.03a preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn07u:6: RV_7,001.03c tvāṃ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:7: RV_7,001.04a pra te agnayo 'gnibhyo varaṃ niḥ suvīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:9: RV_7,001.05a dā no agne dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ svapatyaṃ sahasya praśastam |
GV01rv_hn07u:10: RV_7,001.05c na yaṃ yāvā tarati yātumāvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:11: RV_7,001.06a upa yam eti yuvatiḥ sudakṣaṃ doṣā vastor haviṣmatī ghṛtācī |
GV01rv_hn07u:13: RV_7,001.07a viśvā agne 'pa dahārātīr yebhis tapobhir adaho jarūtham |
GV01rv_hn07u:15: RV_7,001.08a ā yas te agna idhate anīkaṃ vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivaḥ pāvaka |
GV01rv_hn07u:16: RV_7,001.08c uto na ebhi stavathair iha syāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:17: RV_7,001.09a vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martā naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā |
GV01rv_hn07u:18: RV_7,001.09c uto na ebhiḥ sumanā iha syāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:19: RV_7,001.10a ime naro vṛtrahatyeṣu śūrā viśvā adevīr abhi santu māyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:20: RV_7,001.10c ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:21: RV_7,001.11a mā śūne agne ni ṣadāma nṛṇām māśeṣaso 'vīratā pari tvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:23: RV_7,001.12a yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantaṃ svapatyaṃ kṣayaṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:25: RV_7,001.13a pāhi no agne rakṣaso ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrter araruṣo aghāyoḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:26: RV_7,001.13c tvā yujā pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:27: RV_7,001.14a sed agnir agnīṃr aty astv anyān yatra vājī tanayo vīḷupāṇiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:29: RV_7,001.15a sed agnir yo vanuṣyato nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasa uruṣyāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:31: RV_7,001.16a ayaṃ so agnir āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ sam id indhe haviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn07u:32: RV_7,001.16c pari yam ety adhvareṣu hotā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:33: RV_7,001.17a tve agna āhavanāni bhūrīśānāsa ā juhuyāma nityā |
GV01rv_hn07u:35: RV_7,001.18a imo agne vītatamāni havyājasro vakṣi devatātim accha |
GV01rv_hn07u:36: RV_7,001.18c prati na īṃ surabhīṇi vyantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:37: RV_7,001.19a mā no agne 'vīrate parā dā durvāsase 'mataye mā no asyai |
GV01rv_hn07u:38: RV_7,001.19c mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣasa ṛtāvo mā no dame mā vana ā juhūrthāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:39: RV_7,001.20a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:41: RV_7,001.20c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:42: RV_7,001.21a tvam agne suhavo raṇvasaṃdṛk sudītī sūno sahaso didīhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:43: RV_7,001.21c mā tve sacā tanaye nitya ā dhaṅ mā vīro asman naryo vi dāsīt
GV01rv_hn07u:44: RV_7,001.22a mā no agne durbhṛtaye sacaiṣu deveddheṣv agniṣu pra vocaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:45: RV_7,001.22c mā te asmān durmatayo bhṛmāc cid devasya sūno sahaso naśanta
GV01rv_hn07u:46: RV_7,001.23a sa marto agne svanīka revān amartye ya ājuhoti havyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:47: RV_7,001.23c sa devatā vasuvaniṃ dadhāti yaṃ sūrir arthī pṛcchamāna eti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:48: RV_7,001.24a maho no agne suvitasya vidvān rayiṃ sūribhya ā vahā bṛhantam
GV01rv_hn07u:49: RV_7,001.24c yena vayaṃ sahasāvan mademāvikṣitāsa āyuṣā suvīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:50: RV_7,001.25a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:52: RV_7,001.25c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:53: RV_7,002.01a juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śocā bṛhad yajataṃ dhūmam
GV01rv_hn07u:55: RV_7,002.01c upa spṛśa divyaṃ sānu stūpaiḥ saṃ raśmibhis tatanaḥ sūryasya
GV01rv_hn07u:56: RV_7,002.02a narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:57: RV_7,002.02c ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:58: RV_7,002.03a īḷenyaṃ vo asuraṃ sudakṣam antar dūtaṃ rodasī satyavācam |
GV01rv_hn07u:59: RV_7,002.03c manuṣvad agnim manunā samiddhaṃ sam adhvarāya sadam in mahema
GV01rv_hn07u:60: RV_7,002.04a saparyavo bharamāṇā abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhir agnau |
GV01rv_hn07u:61: RV_7,002.04c ājuhvānā ghṛtapṛṣṭham pṛṣadvad adhvaryavo haviṣā marjayadhvam
GV01rv_hn07u:62: RV_7,002.05a svādhyo vi duro devayanto 'śiśrayū rathayur devatātā |
GV01rv_hn07u:63: RV_7,002.05c pūrvī śiśuṃ na mātarā rihāṇe sam agruvo na samaneṣv añjan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:64: RV_7,002.06a uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī na uṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:65: RV_7,002.06c barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:66: RV_7,002.07a viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vāṃ jātavedasā yajadhyai |
GV01rv_hn07u:67: RV_7,002.07c ūrdhvaṃ no adhvaraṃ kṛtaṃ haveṣu tā deveṣu vanatho vāryāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:68: RV_7,002.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:69: RV_7,002.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:70: RV_7,002.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva
GV01rv_hn07u:71: RV_7,002.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:72: RV_7,002.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti |
GV01rv_hn07u:73: RV_7,002.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda ||
GV01rv_hn07u:74: RV_7,002.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:75: RV_7,002.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:76: RV_7,003.01a agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣā yajiṣṭhaṃ dūtam adhvare kṛṇudhvam |
GV01rv_hn07u:77: RV_7,003.01c yo martyeṣu nidhruvir ṛtāvā tapurmūrdhā ghṛtānnaḥ pāvakaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:78: RV_7,003.02a prothad aśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vy asthāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:79: RV_7,003.02c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir adha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam asti
GV01rv_hn07u:80: RV_7,003.03a ud yasya te navajātasya vṛṣṇo 'gne caranty ajarā idhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:81: RV_7,003.03c acchā dyām aruṣo dhūma eti saṃ dūto agna īyase hi devān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:82: RV_7,003.04a vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājo aśret tṛṣu yad annā samavṛkta jambhaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:83: RV_7,003.04c seneva sṛṣṭā prasitiṣ ṭa eti yavaṃ na dasma juhvā vivekṣi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:84: RV_7,003.05a tam id doṣā tam uṣasi yaviṣṭham agnim atyaṃ na marjayanta naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:85: RV_7,003.05c niśiśānā atithim asya yonau dīdāya śocir āhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:86: RV_7,003.06a susaṃdṛk te svanīka pratīkaṃ vi yad rukmo na rocasa upāke |
GV01rv_hn07u:87: RV_7,003.06c divo na te tanyatur eti śuṣmaś citro na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum ||
GV01rv_hn07u:88: RV_7,003.07a yathā vaḥ svāhāgnaye dāśema parīḷābhir ghṛtavadbhiś ca havyaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:89: RV_7,003.07c tebhir no agne amitair mahobhiḥ śatam pūrbhir āyasībhir ni
GV01rv_hn07u:91: RV_7,003.08a yā vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭā giro vā yābhir nṛvatīr uruṣyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:92: RV_7,003.08c tābhir naḥ sūno sahaso ni pāhi smat sūrīñ jaritṝñ jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:93: RV_7,003.09a nir yat pūteva svadhitiḥ śucir gāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:94: RV_7,003.09c ā yo mātror uśenyo janiṣṭa devayajyāya sukratuḥ pāvakaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:95: RV_7,003.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema |
GV01rv_hn07u:96: RV_7,003.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:98: RV_7,004.01a pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvaṃ havyam matiṃ cāgnaye supūtam |
GV01rv_hn07u:99: RV_7,004.01c yo daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣy antar viśvāni vidmanā jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:100: RV_7,004.02a sa gṛtso agnis taruṇaś cid astu yato yaviṣṭho ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:101: RV_7,004.02c saṃ yo vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cid annā sam id atti sadyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:102: RV_7,004.03a asya devasya saṃsady anīke yam martāsaḥ śyetaṃ jagṛbhre |
GV01rv_hn07u:103: RV_7,004.03c ni yo gṛbham pauruṣeyīm uvoca durokam agnir āyave śuśoca ||
GV01rv_hn07u:104: RV_7,004.04a ayaṃ kavir akaviṣu pracetā marteṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi |
GV01rv_hn07u:105: RV_7,004.04c sa mā no atra juhuraḥ sahasvaḥ sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:106: RV_7,004.05a ā yo yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ sasāda kratvā hy agnir amṛtāṃ atārīt |
GV01rv_hn07u:107: RV_7,004.05c tam oṣadhīś ca vaninaś ca garbham bhūmiś ca viśvadhāyasam
GV01rv_hn07u:109: RV_7,004.06a īśe hy agnir amṛtasya bhūrer īśe rāyaḥ suvīryasya dātoḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:110: RV_7,004.06c mā tvā vayaṃ sahasāvann avīrā māpsavaḥ pari ṣadāma māduvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:111: RV_7,004.07a pariṣadyaṃ hy araṇasya rekṇo nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma |
GV01rv_hn07u:112: RV_7,004.07c na śeṣo agne anyajātam asty acetānasya mā patho vi dukṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:113: RV_7,004.08a nahi grabhāyāraṇaḥ suśevo 'nyodaryo manasā mantavā u |
GV01rv_hn07u:114: RV_7,004.08c adhā cid okaḥ punar it sa ety ā no vājy abhīṣāḷ etu navyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:115: RV_7,004.09a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:116: RV_7,004.09c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:118: RV_7,004.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema |
GV01rv_hn07u:119: RV_7,004.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:121: RV_7,005.01a prāgnaye tavase bharadhvaṃ giraṃ divo arataye pṛthivyāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:122: RV_7,005.01c yo viśveṣām amṛtānām upasthe vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:123: RV_7,005.02a pṛṣṭo divi dhāyy agniḥ pṛthivyāṃ netā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām |
GV01rv_hn07u:124: RV_7,005.02c sa mānuṣīr abhi viśo vi bhāti vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhāno vareṇa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:125: RV_7,005.03a tvad bhiyā viśa āyann asiknīr asamanā jahatīr bhojanāni |
GV01rv_hn07u:126: RV_7,005.03c vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puro yad agne darayann adīdeḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:127: RV_7,005.04a tava tridhātu pṛthivī uta dyaur vaiśvānara vratam agne sacanta |
GV01rv_hn07u:128: RV_7,005.04c tvam bhāsā rodasī ā tatanthājasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:129: RV_7,005.05a tvām agne harito vāvaśānā giraḥ sacante dhunayo ghṛtācīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:130: RV_7,005.05c patiṃ kṛṣṭīnāṃ rathyaṃ rayīṇāṃ vaiśvānaram uṣasāṃ ketum ahnām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:131: RV_7,005.06a tve asuryaṃ vasavo ny ṛṇvan kratuṃ hi te mitramaho juṣanta |
GV01rv_hn07u:132: RV_7,005.06c tvaṃ dasyūṃr okaso agna āja uru jyotir janayann āryāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:133: RV_7,005.07a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyur na pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:134: RV_7,005.07c tvam bhuvanā janayann abhi krann apatyāya jātavedo daśasyan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:135: RV_7,005.08a tām agne asme iṣam erayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīṃ jātavedaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:136: RV_7,005.08c yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśvavāra pṛthu śravo dāśuṣe martyāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:137: RV_7,005.09a taṃ no agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣuṃ rayiṃ ni vājaṃ śrutyaṃ
GV01rv_hn07u:139: RV_7,005.09c vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yaccha rudrebhir agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:140: RV_7,006.01a pra samrājo asurasya praśastim puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnām anumādyasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:141: RV_7,006.01c indrasyeva pra tavasas kṛtāni vande dāruṃ vandamāno vivakmi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:142: RV_7,006.02a kaviṃ ketuṃ dhāsim bhānum adrer hinvanti śaṃ rājyaṃ rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:143: RV_7,006.02c purandarasya gīrbhir ā vivāse 'gner vratāni pūrvyā mahāni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:144: RV_7,006.03a ny akratūn grathino mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīṃr aśraddhāṃ avṛdhāṃ ayajñān |
GV01rv_hn07u:145: RV_7,006.03c pra-pra tān dasyūṃr agnir vivāya pūrvaś cakārāparāṃ ayajyūn
GV01rv_hn07u:146: RV_7,006.04a yo apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīś cakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:147: RV_7,006.04c tam īśānaṃ vasvo agniṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn ||
GV01rv_hn07u:148: RV_7,006.05a yo dehyo anamayad vadhasnair yo aryapatnīr uṣasaś cakāra |
GV01rv_hn07u:149: RV_7,006.05c sa nirudhyā nahuṣo yahvo agnir viśaś cakre balihṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:150: RV_7,006.06a yasya śarmann upa viśve janāsa evais tasthuḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:151: RV_7,006.06c vaiśvānaro varam ā rodasyor āgniḥ sasāda pitror upastham ||
GV01rv_hn07u:152: RV_7,006.07a ā devo dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānara uditā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:153: RV_7,006.07c ā samudrād avarād ā parasmād āgnir dade diva ā pṛthivyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:154: RV_7,007.01a pra vo devaṃ cit sahasānam agnim aśvaṃ na vājinaṃ hiṣe namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:155: RV_7,007.01c bhavā no dūto adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:156: RV_7,007.02a ā yāhy agne pathyā anu svā mandro devānāṃ sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:157: RV_7,007.02c ā sānu śuṣmair nadayan pṛthivyā jambhebhir viśvam uśadhag vanāni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:158: RV_7,007.03a prācīno yajñaḥ sudhitaṃ hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agnir īḷito na hotā
GV01rv_hn07u:159: RV_7,007.03c ā mātarā viśvavāre huvāno yato yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe suśevaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:160: RV_7,007.04a sadyo adhvare rathiraṃ jananta mānuṣāso vicetaso ya eṣām |
GV01rv_hn07u:161: RV_7,007.04c viśām adhāyi viśpatir duroṇe 'gnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:162: RV_7,007.05a asādi vṛto vahnir ājaganvān agnir brahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā |
GV01rv_hn07u:163: RV_7,007.05c dyauś ca yam pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yaṃ hotā yajati viśvavāram
GV01rv_hn07u:164: RV_7,007.06a ete dyumnebhir viśvam ātiranta mantraṃ ye vāraṃ naryā atakṣan
GV01rv_hn07u:165: RV_7,007.06c pra ye viśas tiranta śroṣamāṇā ā ye me asya dīdhayann ṛtasya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:166: RV_7,007.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:167: RV_7,007.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:168: RV_7,008.01a indhe rājā sam aryo namobhir yasya pratīkam āhutaṃ ghṛtena |
GV01rv_hn07u:169: RV_7,008.01c naro havyebhir īḷate sabādha āgnir agra uṣasām aśoci ||
GV01rv_hn07u:170: RV_7,008.02a ayam u ṣya sumahāṃ avedi hotā mandro manuṣo yahvo agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:171: RV_7,008.02c vi bhā akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṛṣṇapavir oṣadhībhir vavakṣe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:172: RV_7,008.03a kayā no agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktiṃ kām u svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:173: RV_7,008.03c kadā bhavema patayaḥ sudatra rāyo vantāro duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:174: RV_7,008.04a pra-prāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocate bṛhad bhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:175: RV_7,008.04c abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutāno daivyo atithiḥ śuśoca
GV01rv_hn07u:176: RV_7,008.05a asann it tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvo viśvebhiḥ sumanā anīkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:177: RV_7,008.05c stutaś cid agne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayaṃ vardhasva tanvaṃ sujāta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:178: RV_7,008.06a idaṃ vacaḥ śatasāḥ saṃsahasram ud agnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:179: RV_7,008.06c śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāti dyumad amīvacātanaṃ rakṣohā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:180: RV_7,008.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:181: RV_7,008.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:182: RV_7,009.01a abodhi jāra uṣasām upasthād dhotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:183: RV_7,009.01c dadhāti ketum ubhayasya jantor havyā deveṣu draviṇaṃ sukṛtsu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:184: RV_7,009.02a sa sukratur yo vi duraḥ paṇīnām punāno arkam purubhojasaṃ naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:185: RV_7,009.02c hotā mandro viśāṃ damūnās tiras tamo dadṛśe rāmyāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:186: RV_7,009.03a amūraḥ kavir aditir vivasvān susaṃsan mitro atithiḥ śivo naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:187: RV_7,009.03c citrabhānur uṣasām bhāty agre 'pāṃ garbhaḥ prasva ā viveśa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:188: RV_7,009.04a īḷenyo vo manuṣo yugeṣu samanagā aśucaj jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:189: RV_7,009.04c susaṃdṛśā bhānunā yo vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānam budhanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:190: RV_7,009.05a agne yāhi dūtyam mā riṣaṇyo devāṃ acchā brahmakṛtā gaṇena |
GV01rv_hn07u:191: RV_7,009.05c sarasvatīm maruto aśvināpo yakṣi devān ratnadheyāya viśvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:192: RV_7,009.06a tvām agne samidhāno vasiṣṭho jarūthaṃ han yakṣi rāye purandhim |
GV01rv_hn07u:193: RV_7,009.06c puruṇīthā jātavedo jarasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:194: RV_7,010.01a uṣo na jāraḥ pṛthu pājo aśred davidyutad dīdyac chośucānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:195: RV_7,010.01c vṛṣā hariḥ śucir ā bhāti bhāsā dhiyo hinvāna uśatīr ajīgaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:196: RV_7,010.02a svar ṇa vastor uṣasām aroci yajñaṃ tanvānā uśijo na manma |
GV01rv_hn07u:197: RV_7,010.02c agnir janmāni deva ā vi vidvān dravad dūto devayāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:198: RV_7,010.03a acchā giro matayo devayantīr agniṃ yanti draviṇam bhikṣamāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:199: RV_7,010.03c susaṃdṛśaṃ supratīkaṃ svañcaṃ havyavāham aratim mānuṣāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:200: RV_7,010.04a indraṃ no agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣā rudraṃ rudrebhir ā vahā
GV01rv_hn07u:202: RV_7,010.04c ādityebhir aditiṃ viśvajanyām bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhir viśvavāram
GV01rv_hn07u:203: RV_7,010.05a mandraṃ hotāram uśijo yaviṣṭham agniṃ viśa īḷate adhvareṣu |
GV01rv_hn07u:204: RV_7,010.05c sa hi kṣapāvāṃ abhavad rayīṇām atandro dūto yajathāya devān
GV01rv_hn07u:205: RV_7,011.01a mahāṃ asy adhvarasya praketo na ṛte tvad amṛtā mādayante |
GV01rv_hn07u:206: RV_7,011.01c ā viśvebhiḥ sarathaṃ yāhi devair ny agne hotā prathamaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:208: RV_7,011.02a tvām īḷate ajiraṃ dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadam in mānuṣāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:209: RV_7,011.02c yasya devair āsado barhir agne 'hāny asmai sudinā bhavanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:210: RV_7,011.03a triś cid aktoḥ pra cikitur vasūni tve antar dāśuṣe martyāya |
GV01rv_hn07u:211: RV_7,011.03c manuṣvad agna iha yakṣi devān bhavā no dūto abhiśastipāvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:212: RV_7,011.04a agnir īśe bṛhato adhvarasyāgnir viśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:213: RV_7,011.04c kratuṃ hy asya vasavo juṣantāthā devā dadhire havyavāham ||
GV01rv_hn07u:214: RV_7,011.05a āgne vaha haviradyāya devān indrajyeṣṭhāsa iha mādayantām |
GV01rv_hn07u:215: RV_7,011.05c imaṃ yajñaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:216: RV_7,012.01a aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭhaṃ yo dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe |
GV01rv_hn07u:217: RV_7,012.01c citrabhānuṃ rodasī antar urvī svāhutaṃ viśvataḥ pratyañcam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:218: RV_7,012.02a sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvān agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:219: RV_7,012.02c sa no rakṣiṣad duritād avadyād asmān gṛṇata uta no maghonaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:220: RV_7,012.03a tvaṃ varuṇa uta mitro agne tvāṃ vardhanti matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:221: RV_7,012.03c tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:222: RV_7,013.01a prāgnaye viśvaśuce dhiyandhe 'suraghne manma dhītim bharadhvam |
GV01rv_hn07u:223: RV_7,013.01c bhare havir na barhiṣi prīṇāno vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:224: RV_7,013.02a tvam agne śociṣā śośucāna ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:225: RV_7,013.02c tvaṃ devāṃ abhiśaster amuñco vaiśvānara jātavedo mahitvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:226: RV_7,013.03a jāto yad agne bhuvanā vy akhyaḥ paśūn na gopā iryaḥ parijmā |
GV01rv_hn07u:227: RV_7,013.03c vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātuṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:229: RV_7,014.01c havirbhiḥ śukraśociṣe namasvino vayaṃ dāśemāgnaye ||
GV01rv_hn07u:230: RV_7,014.02a vayaṃ te agne samidhā vidhema vayaṃ dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra |
GV01rv_hn07u:231: RV_7,014.02c vayaṃ ghṛtenādhvarasya hotar vayaṃ deva haviṣā bhadraśoce ||
GV01rv_hn07u:232: RV_7,014.03a ā no devebhir upa devahūtim agne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtiṃ juṣāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:233: RV_7,014.03c tubhyaṃ devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:234: RV_7,015.01a upasadyāya mīḷhuṣa āsye juhutā haviḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:236: RV_7,015.02a yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi niṣasāda dame-dame |
GV01rv_hn07u:238: RV_7,015.03a sa no vedo amātyam agnī rakṣatu viśvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:240: RV_7,015.04a navaṃ nu stomam agnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam |
GV01rv_hn07u:242: RV_7,015.05a spārhā yasya śriyo dṛśe rayir vīravato yathā |
GV01rv_hn07u:244: RV_7,015.06a semāṃ vetu vaṣaṭkṛtim agnir juṣata no giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:246: RV_7,015.07a ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantaṃ deva dhīmahi |
GV01rv_hn07u:248: RV_7,015.08a kṣapa usraś ca dīdihi svagnayas tvayā vayam |
GV01rv_hn07u:250: RV_7,015.09a upa tvā sātaye naro viprāso yanti dhītibhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:252: RV_7,015.10a agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:254: RV_7,015.11a sa no rādhāṃsy ā bhareśānaḥ sahaso yaho |
GV01rv_hn07u:256: RV_7,015.12a tvam agne vīravad yaśo devaś ca savitā bhagaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:258: RV_7,015.13a agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:260: RV_7,015.14a adhā mahī na āyasy anādhṛṣṭo nṛpītaye |
GV01rv_hn07u:262: RV_7,015.15a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso doṣāvastar aghāyataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:264: RV_7,016.01a enā vo agniṃ namasorjo napātam ā huve |
GV01rv_hn07u:265: RV_7,016.01c priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ svadhvaraṃ viśvasya dūtam amṛtam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:266: RV_7,016.02a sa yojate aruṣā viśvabhojasā sa dudravat svāhutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:267: RV_7,016.02c subrahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnāṃ devaṃ rādho janānām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:268: RV_7,016.03a ud asya śocir asthād ājuhvānasya mīḷhuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:269: RV_7,016.03c ud dhūmāso aruṣāso divispṛśaḥ sam agnim indhate naraḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:270: RV_7,016.04a taṃ tvā dūtaṃ kṛṇmahe yaśastamaṃ devāṃ ā vītaye vaha |
GV01rv_hn07u:271: RV_7,016.04c viśvā sūno sahaso martabhojanā rāsva tad yat tvemahe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:272: RV_7,016.05a tvam agne gṛhapatis tvaṃ hotā no adhvare |
GV01rv_hn07u:273: RV_7,016.05c tvam potā viśvavāra pracetā yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:274: RV_7,016.06a kṛdhi ratnaṃ yajamānāya sukrato tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi |
GV01rv_hn07u:275: RV_7,016.06c ā na ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijaṃ suśaṃso yaś ca dakṣate ||
GV01rv_hn07u:276: RV_7,016.07a tve agne svāhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:277: RV_7,016.07c yantāro ye maghavāno janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:278: RV_7,016.08a yeṣām iḷā ghṛtahastā duroṇa āṃ api prātā niṣīdati |
GV01rv_hn07u:279: RV_7,016.08c tāṃs trāyasva sahasya druho nido yacchā naḥ śarma dīrghaśrut
GV01rv_hn07u:280: RV_7,016.09a sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:281: RV_7,016.09c agne rayim maghavadbhyo na ā vaha havyadātiṃ ca sūdaya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:282: RV_7,016.10a ye rādhāṃsi dadaty aśvyā maghā kāmena śravaso mahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:283: RV_7,016.10c tāṃ aṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭhya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:284: RV_7,016.11a devo vo draviṇodāḥ pūrṇāṃ vivaṣṭy āsicam |
GV01rv_hn07u:285: RV_7,016.11c ud vā siñcadhvam upa vā pṛṇadhvam ād id vo deva ohate ||
GV01rv_hn07u:286: RV_7,016.12a taṃ hotāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ vahniṃ devā akṛṇvata |
GV01rv_hn07u:287: RV_7,016.12c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate suvīryam agnir janāya dāśuṣe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:288: RV_7,017.01 agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddha uta barhir urviyā vi stṛṇītām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:289: RV_7,017.02 uta dvāra uśatīr vi śrayantām uta devāṃ uśata ā vaheha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:290: RV_7,017.03 agne vīhi haviṣā yakṣi devān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:291: RV_7,017.04 svadhvarā karati jātavedā yakṣad devāṃ amṛtān piprayac ca ||
GV01rv_hn07u:292: RV_7,017.05 vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyā bhavantv āśiṣo no adya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:293: RV_7,017.06 tvām u te dadhire havyavāhaṃ devāso agna ūrja ā napātam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:294: RV_7,017.07 te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma maho no ratnā vi dadha iyānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:295: RV_7,018.01a tve ha yat pitaraś cin na indra viśvā vāmā jaritāro asanvan |
GV01rv_hn07u:296: RV_7,018.01c tve gāvaḥ sudughās tve hy aśvās tvaṃ vasu devayate vaniṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:297: RV_7,018.02a rājeva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣy evāva dyubhir abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san |
GV01rv_hn07u:298: RV_7,018.02c piśā giro maghavan gobhir aśvais tvāyataḥ śiśīhi rāye asmān
GV01rv_hn07u:299: RV_7,018.03a imā u tvā paspṛdhānāso atra mandrā giro devayantīr upa sthuḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:300: RV_7,018.03c arvācī te pathyā rāya etu syāma te sumatāv indra śarman ||
GV01rv_hn07u:301: RV_7,018.04a dhenuṃ na tvā sūyavase dudukṣann upa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:302: RV_7,018.04c tvām in me gopatiṃ viśva āhā na indraḥ sumatiṃ gantv accha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:303: RV_7,018.05a arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāsa indro gādhāny akṛṇot supārā |
GV01rv_hn07u:304: RV_7,018.05c śardhantaṃ śimyum ucathasya navyaḥ śāpaṃ sindhūnām akṛṇod aśastīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:305: RV_7,018.06a puroḷā it turvaśo yakṣur āsīd rāye matsyāso niśitā apīva |
GV01rv_hn07u:306: RV_7,018.06c śruṣṭiṃ cakrur bhṛgavo druhyavaś ca sakhā sakhāyam atarad viṣūcoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:307: RV_7,018.07a ā pakthāso bhalānaso bhanantālināso viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:308: RV_7,018.07c ā yo 'nayat sadhamā āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyo ajagan yudhā nṝn
GV01rv_hn07u:309: RV_7,018.08a durādhyo aditiṃ srevayanto 'cetaso vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm |
GV01rv_hn07u:310: RV_7,018.08c mahnāvivyak pṛthivīm patyamānaḥ paśuṣ kavir aśayac cāyamānaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:311: RV_7,018.09a īyur arthaṃ na nyartham paruṣṇīm āśuś caned abhipitvaṃ jagāma
GV01rv_hn07u:312: RV_7,018.09c sudāsa indraḥ sutukāṃ amitrān arandhayan mānuṣe vadhrivācaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:313: RV_7,018.10a īyur gāvo na yavasād agopā yathākṛtam abhi mitraṃ citāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:314: RV_7,018.10c pṛśnigāvaḥ pṛśninipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakrur niyuto rantayaś
GV01rv_hn07u:316: RV_7,018.11a ekaṃ ca yo viṃśatiṃ ca śravasyā vaikarṇayor janān rājā ny astaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:317: RV_7,018.11c dasmo na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargam akṛṇod indra eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:318: RV_7,018.12a adha śrutaṃ kavaṣaṃ vṛddham apsv anu druhyuṃ ni vṛṇag
GV01rv_hn07u:320: RV_7,018.12c vṛṇānā atra sakhyāya sakhyaṃ tvāyanto ye amadann anu tvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:321: RV_7,018.13a vi sadyo viśvā dṛṃhitāny eṣām indraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta
GV01rv_hn07u:323: RV_7,018.13c vy ānavasya tṛtsave gayam bhāg jeṣma pūruṃ vidathe mṛdhravācam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:324: RV_7,018.14a ni gavyavo 'navo druhyavaś ca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaṭ sahasrā
GV01rv_hn07u:325: RV_7,018.14c ṣaṣṭir vīrāso adhi ṣaḍ duvoyu viśved indrasya vīryā kṛtāni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:326: RV_7,018.15a indreṇaite tṛtsavo veviṣāṇā āpo na sṛṣṭā adhavanta nīcīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:327: RV_7,018.15c durmitrāsaḥ prakalavin mimānā jahur viśvāni bhojanā sudāse ||
GV01rv_hn07u:328: RV_7,018.16a ardhaṃ vīrasya śṛtapām anindram parā śardhantaṃ nunude abhi kṣām |
GV01rv_hn07u:329: RV_7,018.16c indro manyum manyumyo mimāya bheje patho vartanim patyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:330: RV_7,018.17a ādhreṇa cit tad v ekaṃ cakāra siṃhyaṃ cit petvenā jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn07u:331: RV_7,018.17c ava sraktīr veśyāvṛścad indraḥ prāyacchad viśvā bhojanā sudāse ||
GV01rv_hn07u:332: RV_7,018.18a śaśvanto hi śatravo rāradhuṣ ṭe bhedasya cic chardhato vinda
GV01rv_hn07u:334: RV_7,018.18c martāṃ ena stuvato yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmaṃ tasmin ni jahi vajram indra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:335: RV_7,018.19a āvad indraṃ yamunā tṛtsavaś ca prātra bhedaṃ sarvatātā muṣāyat |
GV01rv_hn07u:336: RV_7,018.19c ajāsaś ca śigravo yakṣavaś ca baliṃ śīrṣāṇi jabhrur aśvyāni
GV01rv_hn07u:337: RV_7,018.20a na ta indra sumatayo na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvā uṣaso na nūtnāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:338: RV_7,018.20c devakaṃ cin mānyamānaṃ jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaram bhet ||
GV01rv_hn07u:339: RV_7,018.21a pra ye gṛhād amamadus tvāyā parāśaraḥ śatayātur vasiṣṭhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:340: RV_7,018.21c na te bhojasya sakhyam mṛṣantādhā sūribhyaḥ sudinā vy ucchān
GV01rv_hn07u:341: RV_7,018.22a dve naptur devavataḥ śate gor dvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:342: RV_7,018.22c arhann agne paijavanasya dānaṃ hoteva sadma pary emi rebhan
GV01rv_hn07u:343: RV_7,018.23a catvāro mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smaddiṣṭayaḥ kṛśanino nireke |
GV01rv_hn07u:344: RV_7,018.23c ṛjrāso mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsas tokaṃ tokāya śravase vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:345: RV_7,018.24a yasya śravo rodasī antar urvī śīrṣṇe-śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā |
GV01rv_hn07u:346: RV_7,018.24c sapted indraṃ na sravato gṛṇanti ni yudhyāmadhim aśiśād abhīke ||
GV01rv_hn07u:347: RV_7,018.25a imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatānu divodāsaṃ na pitaraṃ sudāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:348: RV_7,018.25c aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketaṃ dūṇāśaṃ kṣatram ajaraṃ duvoyu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:349: RV_7,019.01a yas tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīma ekaḥ kṛṣṭīś cyāvayati pra
GV01rv_hn07u:351: RV_7,019.01c yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:352: RV_7,019.02a tvaṃ ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye |
GV01rv_hn07u:353: RV_7,019.02c dāsaṃ yac chuṣṇaṃ kuyavaṃ ny asmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan
GV01rv_hn07u:354: RV_7,019.03a tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvo viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sudāsam |
GV01rv_hn07u:355: RV_7,019.03c pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu
GV01rv_hn07u:357: RV_7,019.04a tvaṃ nṛbhir nṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi |
GV01rv_hn07u:358: RV_7,019.04c tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:359: RV_7,019.05a tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca
GV01rv_hn07u:361: RV_7,019.05c niveśane śatatamāviveṣīr ahañ ca vṛtraṃ namucim utāhan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:362: RV_7,019.06a sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse |
GV01rv_hn07u:363: RV_7,019.06c vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam
GV01rv_hn07u:364: RV_7,019.07a mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāv aghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādai |
GV01rv_hn07u:365: RV_7,019.07c trāyasva no 'vṛkebhir varūthais tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:366: RV_7,019.08a priyāsa it te maghavann abhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:367: RV_7,019.08c ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhy atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:368: RV_7,019.09a sadyaś cin nu te maghavann abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanty ukthaśāsa
GV01rv_hn07u:370: RV_7,019.09c ye te havebhir vi paṇīṃr adāśann asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai
GV01rv_hn07u:371: RV_7,019.10a ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañco dadato maghāni |
GV01rv_hn07u:372: RV_7,019.10c teṣām indra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitā ca nṛṇām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:373: RV_7,019.11a nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhasva |
GV01rv_hn07u:374: RV_7,019.11c upa no vājān mimīhy upa stīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:375: RV_7,020.01a ugro jajñe vīryāya svadhāvāñ cakrir apo naryo yat kariṣyan |
GV01rv_hn07u:376: RV_7,020.01c jagmir yuvā nṛṣadanam avobhis trātā na indra enaso mahaś cit
GV01rv_hn07u:377: RV_7,020.02a hantā vṛtram indraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīn nu vīro jaritāram ūtī |
GV01rv_hn07u:378: RV_7,020.02c kartā sudāse aha vā u lokaṃ dātā vasu muhur ā dāśuṣe bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:379: RV_7,020.03a yudhmo anarvā khajakṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāḍ januṣem aṣāḷhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:380: RV_7,020.03c vy āsa indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā adhā viśvaṃ śatrūyantaṃ jaghāna
GV01rv_hn07u:381: RV_7,020.04a ubhe cid indra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhis tuviṣmaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:382: RV_7,020.04c ni vajram indro harivān mimikṣan sam andhasā madeṣu vā uvoca
GV01rv_hn07u:383: RV_7,020.05a vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇaṃ raṇāya tam u cin nārī naryaṃ sasūva |
GV01rv_hn07u:384: RV_7,020.05c pra yaḥ senānīr adha nṛbhyo astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa
GV01rv_hn07u:386: RV_7,020.06a nū cit sa bhreṣate jano na reṣan mano yo asya ghoram āvivāsāt
GV01rv_hn07u:387: RV_7,020.06c yajñair ya indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāya ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:388: RV_7,020.07a yad indra pūrvo aparāya śikṣann ayaj jyāyān kanīyaso deṣṇam |
GV01rv_hn07u:389: RV_7,020.07c amṛta it pary āsīta dūram ā citra citryam bharā rayiṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:390: RV_7,020.08a yas ta indra priyo jano dadāśad asan nireke adrivaḥ sakhā te |
GV01rv_hn07u:391: RV_7,020.08c vayaṃ te asyāṃ sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe aghnato nṛpītau ||
GV01rv_hn07u:392: RV_7,020.09a eṣa stomo acikradad vṛṣā ta uta stāmur maghavann akrapiṣṭa |
GV01rv_hn07u:393: RV_7,020.09c rāyas kāmo jaritāraṃ ta āgan tvam aṅga śakra vasva ā śako naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:394: RV_7,020.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:395: RV_7,020.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:396: RV_7,021.01a asāvi devaṃ goṛjīkam andho ny asminn indro januṣem uvoca |
GV01rv_hn07u:397: RV_7,021.01c bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñair bodhā na stomam andhaso madeṣu
GV01rv_hn07u:398: RV_7,021.02a pra yanti yajñaṃ vipayanti barhiḥ somamādo vidathe dudhravācaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:399: RV_7,021.02c ny u bhriyante yaśaso gṛbhād ā dūraupabdo vṛṣaṇo nṛṣācaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:400: RV_7,021.03a tvam indra sravitavā apas kaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:401: RV_7,021.03c tvad vāvakre rathyo na dhenā rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:402: RV_7,021.04a bhīmo viveṣāyudhebhir eṣām apāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān |
GV01rv_hn07u:403: RV_7,021.04c indraḥ puro jarhṛṣāṇo vi dūdhod vi vajrahasto mahinā jaghāna
GV01rv_hn07u:404: RV_7,021.05a na yātava indra jūjuvur no na vandanā śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:405: RV_7,021.05c sa śardhad aryo viṣuṇasya jantor mā śiśnadevā api gur ṛtaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:406: RV_7,021.06a abhi kratvendra bhūr adha jman na te vivyaṅ mahimānaṃ rajāṃsi
GV01rv_hn07u:407: RV_7,021.06c svenā hi vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghantha na śatrur antaṃ vividad
GV01rv_hn07u:409: RV_7,021.07a devāś cit te asuryāya pūrve 'nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn07u:410: RV_7,021.07c indro maghāni dayate viṣahyendraṃ vājasya johuvanta sātau ||
GV01rv_hn07u:411: RV_7,021.08a kīriś cid dhi tvām avase juhāveśānam indra saubhagasya bhūreḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:412: RV_7,021.08c avo babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattus tvāvato varūtā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:413: RV_7,021.09a sakhāyas ta indra viśvaha syāma namovṛdhāso mahinā tarutra |
GV01rv_hn07u:414: RV_7,021.09c vanvantu smā te 'vasā samīke 'bhītim aryo vanuṣāṃ śavāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:415: RV_7,021.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:416: RV_7,021.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:417: RV_7,022.01a pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yaṃ te suṣāva haryaśvādriḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:419: RV_7,022.02a yas te mado yujyaś cārur asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi |
GV01rv_hn07u:420: RV_7,022.02c sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:421: RV_7,022.03a bodhā su me maghavan vācam emāṃ yāṃ te vasiṣṭho arcati praśastim |
GV01rv_hn07u:423: RV_7,022.04a śrudhī havaṃ vipipānasyādrer bodhā viprasyārcato manīṣām |
GV01rv_hn07u:425: RV_7,022.05a na te giro api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutim asuryasya vidvān |
GV01rv_hn07u:426: RV_7,022.05c sadā te nāma svayaśo vivakmi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:427: RV_7,022.06a bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvām it |
GV01rv_hn07u:428: RV_7,022.06c māre asman maghavañ jyok kaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:429: RV_7,022.07a tubhyed imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi |
GV01rv_hn07u:431: RV_7,022.08a nū cin nu te manyamānasya dasmod aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra |
GV01rv_hn07u:432: RV_7,022.08c na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:433: RV_7,022.09a ye ca pūrva ṛṣayo ye ca nūtnā indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:434: RV_7,022.09c asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:435: RV_7,023.01a ud u brahmāṇy airata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha |
GV01rv_hn07u:436: RV_7,023.01c ā yo viśvāni śavasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:437: RV_7,023.02a ayāmi ghoṣa indra devajāmir irajyanta yac churudho vivāci |
GV01rv_hn07u:438: RV_7,023.02c nahi svam āyuś cikite janeṣu tānīd aṃhāṃsy ati parṣy asmān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:439: RV_7,023.03a yuje rathaṃ gaveṣaṇaṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:440: RV_7,023.03c vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghanvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:441: RV_7,023.04a āpaś cit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣann ṛtaṃ jaritāras ta indra |
GV01rv_hn07u:442: RV_7,023.04c yāhi vāyur na niyuto no acchā tvaṃ hi dhībhir dayase vi vājān
GV01rv_hn07u:443: RV_7,023.05a te tvā madā indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇaṃ tuvirādhasaṃ jaritre |
GV01rv_hn07u:444: RV_7,023.05c eko devatrā dayase hi martān asmiñ chūra savane mādayasva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:445: RV_7,023.06a eved indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhuṃ vasiṣṭhāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:446: RV_7,023.06c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:447: RV_7,024.01a yoniṣ ṭa indra sadane akāri tam ā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:448: RV_7,024.01c aso yathā no 'vitā vṛdhe ca dado vasūni mamadaś ca somaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:449: RV_7,024.02a gṛbhītaṃ te mana indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni |
GV01rv_hn07u:450: RV_7,024.02c visṛṣṭadhenā bharate suvṛktir iyam indraṃ johuvatī manīṣā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:451: RV_7,024.03a ā no diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣinn idam barhiḥ somapeyāya yāhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:452: RV_7,024.03c vahantu tvā harayo madryañcam āṅgūṣam acchā tavasam madāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:453: RV_7,024.04a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sajoṣā brahma juṣāṇo haryaśva yāhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:454: RV_7,024.04c varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ suśiprāsme dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra
GV01rv_hn07u:455: RV_7,024.05a eṣa stomo maha ugrāya vāhe dhurīvātyo na vājayann adhāyi |
GV01rv_hn07u:456: RV_7,024.05c indra tvāyam arka īṭṭe vasūnāṃ divīva dyām adhi naḥ śromataṃ dhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:457: RV_7,024.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma |
GV01rv_hn07u:458: RV_7,024.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:459: RV_7,025.01a ā te maha indroty ugra samanyavo yat samaranta senāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:460: RV_7,025.01c patāti didyun naryasya bāhvor mā te mano viṣvadryag vi cārīt
GV01rv_hn07u:461: RV_7,025.02a ni durga indra śnathihy amitrāṃ abhi ye no martāso amanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:462: RV_7,025.02c āre taṃ śaṃsaṃ kṛṇuhi ninitsor ā no bhara sambharaṇaṃ vasūnām
GV01rv_hn07u:463: RV_7,025.03a śataṃ te śiprinn ūtayaḥ sudāse sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta rātir astu
GV01rv_hn07u:464: RV_7,025.03c jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasyāsme dyumnam adhi ratnaṃ ca dhehi
GV01rv_hn07u:465: RV_7,025.04a tvāvato hīndra kratve asmi tvāvato 'vituḥ śūra rātau |
GV01rv_hn07u:466: RV_7,025.04c viśved ahāni taviṣīva ugraṃ okaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivo na mardhīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:467: RV_7,025.05a kutsā ete haryaśvāya śūṣam indre saho devajūtam iyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:468: RV_7,025.05c satrā kṛdhi suhanā śūra vṛtrā vayaṃ tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam
GV01rv_hn07u:469: RV_7,025.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma |
GV01rv_hn07u:470: RV_7,025.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:471: RV_7,026.01a na soma indram asuto mamāda nābrahmāṇo maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:472: RV_7,026.01c tasmā ukthaṃ janaye yaj jujoṣan nṛvan navīyaḥ śṛṇavad yathā
GV01rv_hn07u:474: RV_7,026.02a uktha-ukthe soma indram mamāda nīthe-nīthe maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:475: RV_7,026.02c yad īṃ sabādhaḥ pitaraṃ na putrāḥ samānadakṣā avase havante
GV01rv_hn07u:476: RV_7,026.03a cakāra tā kṛṇavan nūnam anyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu |
GV01rv_hn07u:477: RV_7,026.03c janīr iva patir ekaḥ samāno ni māmṛje pura indraḥ su sarvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:478: RV_7,026.04a evā tam āhur uta śṛṇva indra eko vibhaktā taraṇir maghānām |
GV01rv_hn07u:479: RV_7,026.04c mithastura ūtayo yasya pūrvīr asme bhadrāṇi saścata priyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:480: RV_7,026.05a evā vasiṣṭha indram ūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sute gṛṇāti |
GV01rv_hn07u:481: RV_7,026.05c sahasriṇa upa no māhi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:482: RV_7,027.01a indraṃ naro nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyas tāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:483: RV_7,027.01c śūro nṛṣātā śavasaś cakāna ā gomati vraje bhajā tvaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:484: RV_7,027.02a ya indra śuṣmo maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūta
GV01rv_hn07u:486: RV_7,027.02c tvaṃ hi dṛḷhā maghavan vicetā apā vṛdhi parivṛtaṃ na rādhaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:487: RV_7,027.03a indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti |
GV01rv_hn07u:488: RV_7,027.03c tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk ||
GV01rv_hn07u:489: RV_7,027.04a nū cin na indro maghavā sahūtī dāno vājaṃ ni yamate na ūtī |
GV01rv_hn07u:490: RV_7,027.04c anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmaṃ nṛbhyo abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:491: RV_7,027.05a nū indra rāye varivas kṛdhī na ā te mano vavṛtyāma maghāya |
GV01rv_hn07u:492: RV_7,027.05c gomad aśvāvad rathavad vyanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:493: RV_7,028.01a brahmā ṇa indropa yāhi vidvān arvāñcas te harayaḥ santu
GV01rv_hn07u:495: RV_7,028.01c viśve cid dhi tvā vihavanta martā asmākam ic chṛṇuhi
GV01rv_hn07u:497: RV_7,028.02a havaṃ ta indra mahimā vy ānaḍ brahma yat pāsi śavasinn ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:498: RV_7,028.02c ā yad vajraṃ dadhiṣe hasta ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhā aṣāḷhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:499: RV_7,028.03a tava praṇītīndra johuvānān saṃ yan nṝn na rodasī ninetha |
GV01rv_hn07u:500: RV_7,028.03c mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe 'tūtujiṃ cit tūtujir aśiśnat ||
GV01rv_hn07u:501: RV_7,028.04a ebhir na indrāhabhir daśasya durmitrāso hi kṣitayaḥ pavante |
GV01rv_hn07u:502: RV_7,028.04c prati yac caṣṭe anṛtam anenā ava dvitā varuṇo māyī naḥ sāt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:503: RV_7,028.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan
GV01rv_hn07u:505: RV_7,028.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:506: RV_7,029.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunva ā tu pra yāhi harivas tadokāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:507: RV_7,029.01c pibā tv asya suṣutasya cāror dado maghāni maghavann iyānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:508: RV_7,029.02a brahman vīra brahmakṛtiṃ juṣāṇo 'rvācīno haribhir yāhi tūyam
GV01rv_hn07u:509: RV_7,029.02c asminn ū ṣu savane mādayasvopa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:510: RV_7,029.03a kā te asty araṅkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnaṃ te maghavan dāśema |
GV01rv_hn07u:511: RV_7,029.03c viśvā matīr ā tatane tvāyādhā ma indra śṛṇavo havemā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:512: RV_7,029.04a uto ghā te puruṣyā id āsan yeṣām pūrveṣām aśṛṇor ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:513: RV_7,029.04c adhāhaṃ tvā maghavañ johavīmi tvaṃ na indrāsi pramatiḥ piteva
GV01rv_hn07u:514: RV_7,029.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan
GV01rv_hn07u:516: RV_7,029.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:517: RV_7,030.01a ā no deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhavā vṛdha indra rāyo asya |
GV01rv_hn07u:518: RV_7,030.01c mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate suvajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:519: RV_7,030.02a havanta u tvā havyaṃ vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau |
GV01rv_hn07u:520: RV_7,030.02c tvaṃ viśveṣu senyo janeṣu tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi randhayā suhantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:521: RV_7,030.03a ahā yad indra sudinā vyucchān dadho yat ketum upamaṃ samatsu
GV01rv_hn07u:522: RV_7,030.03c ny agniḥ sīdad asuro na hotā huvāno atra subhagāya devān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:523: RV_7,030.04a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadato maghāni |
GV01rv_hn07u:524: RV_7,030.04c yacchā sūribhya upamaṃ varūthaṃ svābhuvo jaraṇām aśnavanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:525: RV_7,030.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan
GV01rv_hn07u:527: RV_7,030.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:528: RV_7,031.01a pra va indrāya mādanaṃ haryaśvāya gāyata |
GV01rv_hn07u:530: RV_7,031.02a śaṃsed ukthaṃ sudānava uta dyukṣaṃ yathā naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:532: RV_7,031.03a tvaṃ na indra vājayus tvaṃ gavyuḥ śatakrato |
GV01rv_hn07u:534: RV_7,031.04a vayam indra tvāyavo 'bhi pra ṇonumo vṛṣan |
GV01rv_hn07u:535: RV_7,031.04c viddhī tv asya no vaso ||
GV01rv_hn07u:536: RV_7,031.05a mā no nide ca vaktave 'ryo randhīr arāvṇe |
GV01rv_hn07u:538: RV_7,031.06a tvaṃ varmāsi saprathaḥ puroyodhaś ca vṛtrahan |
GV01rv_hn07u:540: RV_7,031.07a mahāṃ utāsi yasya te 'nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:542: RV_7,031.08a taṃ tvā marutvatī pari bhuvad vāṇī sayāvarī |
GV01rv_hn07u:544: RV_7,031.09a ūrdhvāsas tvānv indavo bhuvan dasmam upa dyavi |
GV01rv_hn07u:546: RV_7,031.10a pra vo mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam |
GV01rv_hn07u:547: RV_7,031.10c viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra carā carṣaṇiprāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:548: RV_7,031.11a uruvyacase mahine suvṛktim indrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:549: RV_7,031.11c tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:550: RV_7,031.12a indraṃ vāṇīr anuttamanyum eva satrā rājānaṃ dadhire sahadhyai |
GV01rv_hn07u:552: RV_7,032.01a mo ṣu tvā vāghataś canāre asman ni rīraman |
GV01rv_hn07u:553: RV_7,032.01c ārāttāc cit sadhamādaṃ na ā gahīha vā sann upa śrudhi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:554: RV_7,032.02a ime hi te brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣa āsate |
GV01rv_hn07u:555: RV_7,032.02c indre kāmaṃ jaritāro vasūyavo rathe na pādam ā dadhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:556: RV_7,032.03 rāyaskāmo vajrahastaṃ sudakṣiṇam putro na pitaraṃ huve ||
GV01rv_hn07u:557: RV_7,032.04a ima indrāya sunvire somāso dadhyāśiraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:558: RV_7,032.04c tāṃ ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyāṃ yāhy oka ā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:559: RV_7,032.05a śravac chrutkarṇa īyate vasūnāṃ nū cin no mardhiṣad giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:560: RV_7,032.05c sadyaś cid yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadan nakir ditsantam ā minat
GV01rv_hn07u:561: RV_7,032.06a sa vīro apratiṣkuta indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:562: RV_7,032.06c yas te gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunoty ā ca dhāvati ||
GV01rv_hn07u:563: RV_7,032.07a bhavā varūtham maghavan maghonāṃ yat samajāsi śardhataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:564: RV_7,032.07c vi tvāhatasya vedanam bhajemahy ā dūṇāśo bharā gayam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:565: RV_7,032.08a sunotā somapāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe |
GV01rv_hn07u:566: RV_7,032.08c pacatā paktīr avase kṛṇudhvam it pṛṇann it pṛṇate mayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:567: RV_7,032.09a mā sredhata somino dakṣatā mahe kṛṇudhvaṃ rāya ātuje |
GV01rv_hn07u:568: RV_7,032.09c taraṇir ij jayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave ||
GV01rv_hn07u:569: RV_7,032.10a nakiḥ sudāso ratham pary āsa na rīramat |
GV01rv_hn07u:570: RV_7,032.10c indro yasyāvitā yasya maruto gamat sa gomati vraje ||
GV01rv_hn07u:571: RV_7,032.11a gamad vājaṃ vājayann indra martyo yasya tvam avitā bhuvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:572: RV_7,032.11c asmākam bodhy avitā rathānām asmākaṃ śūra nṛṇām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:573: RV_7,032.12a ud in nv asya ricyate 'ṃśo dhanaṃ na jigyuṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:574: RV_7,032.12c ya indro harivān na dabhanti taṃ ripo dakṣaṃ dadhāti somini
GV01rv_hn07u:575: RV_7,032.13a mantram akharvaṃ sudhitaṃ supeśasaṃ dadhāta yajñiyeṣv ā |
GV01rv_hn07u:576: RV_7,032.13c pūrvīś cana prasitayas taranti taṃ ya indre karmaṇā bhuvat ||
GV01rv_hn07u:577: RV_7,032.14a kas tam indra tvāvasum ā martyo dadharṣati |
GV01rv_hn07u:578: RV_7,032.14c śraddhā it te maghavan pārye divi vājī vājaṃ siṣāsati ||
GV01rv_hn07u:579: RV_7,032.15a maghonaḥ sma vṛtrahatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu |
GV01rv_hn07u:580: RV_7,032.15c tava praṇītī haryaśva sūribhir viśvā tarema duritā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:581: RV_7,032.16a taved indrāvamaṃ vasu tvam puṣyasi madhyamam |
GV01rv_hn07u:582: RV_7,032.16c satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakiṣ ṭvā goṣu vṛṇvate ||
GV01rv_hn07u:583: RV_7,032.17a tvaṃ viśvasya dhanadā asi śruto ya īm bhavanty ājayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:584: RV_7,032.17c tavāyaṃ viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivo 'vasyur nāma bhikṣate ||
GV01rv_hn07u:585: RV_7,032.18a yad indra yāvatas tvam etāvad aham īśīya |
GV01rv_hn07u:586: RV_7,032.18c stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:587: RV_7,032.19a śikṣeyam in mahayate dive-dive rāya ā kuhacidvide |
GV01rv_hn07u:588: RV_7,032.19c nahi tvad anyan maghavan na āpyaṃ vasyo asti pitā cana ||
GV01rv_hn07u:589: RV_7,032.20a taraṇir it siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā |
GV01rv_hn07u:590: RV_7,032.20c ā va indram puruhūtaṃ name girā nemiṃ taṣṭeva sudrvam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:591: RV_7,032.21a na duṣṭutī martyo vindate vasu na sredhantaṃ rayir naśat |
GV01rv_hn07u:592: RV_7,032.21c suśaktir in maghavan tubhyam māvate deṣṇaṃ yat pārye divi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:593: RV_7,032.22a abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:594: RV_7,032.22c īśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:595: RV_7,032.23a na tvāvāṃ anyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate |
GV01rv_hn07u:596: RV_7,032.23c aśvāyanto maghavann indra vājino gavyantas tvā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:597: RV_7,032.24a abhī ṣatas tad ā bharendra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:598: RV_7,032.24c purūvasur hi maghavan sanād asi bhare-bhare ca havyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:599: RV_7,032.25a parā ṇudasva maghavann amitrān suvedā no vasū kṛdhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:600: RV_7,032.25c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:601: RV_7,032.26a indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā |
GV01rv_hn07u:602: RV_7,032.26c śikṣā ṇo asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvā jyotir aśīmahi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:603: RV_7,032.27a mā no ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso ava kramuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:604: RV_7,032.27c tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:605: RV_7,033.01a śvityañco mā dakṣiṇataskapardā dhiyañjinvāso abhi hi
GV01rv_hn07u:607: RV_7,033.01c uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣo nṝn na me dūrād avitave vasiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:608: RV_7,033.02a dūrād indram anayann ā sutena tiro vaiśantam ati pāntam ugram
GV01rv_hn07u:609: RV_7,033.02c pāśadyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutād indro 'vṛṇītā vasiṣṭhān
GV01rv_hn07u:610: RV_7,033.03a even nu kaṃ sindhum ebhis tatāreven nu kam bhedam ebhir jaghāna |
GV01rv_hn07u:611: RV_7,033.03c even nu kaṃ dāśarājñe sudāsam prāvad indro brahmaṇā vo
GV01rv_hn07u:613: RV_7,033.04a juṣṭī naro brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇām akṣam avyayaṃ na kilā riṣātha
GV01rv_hn07u:614: RV_7,033.04c yac chakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇendre śuṣmam adadhātā vasiṣṭhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:615: RV_7,033.05a ud dyām ivet tṛṣṇajo nāthitāso 'dīdhayur dāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:616: RV_7,033.05c vasiṣṭhasya stuvata indro aśrod uruṃ tṛtsubhyo akṛṇod u lokam
GV01rv_hn07u:617: RV_7,033.06a daṇḍā ived goajanāsa āsan paricchinnā bharatā arbhakāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:618: RV_7,033.06c abhavac ca puraetā vasiṣṭha ād it tṛtsūnāṃ viśo aprathanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:619: RV_7,033.07a trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retas tisraḥ prajā āryā jyotiragrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:620: RV_7,033.07c trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante sarvāṃ it tāṃ anu vidur
GV01rv_hn07u:622: RV_7,033.08a sūryasyeva vakṣatho jyotir eṣāṃ samudrasyeva mahimā gabhīraḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:623: RV_7,033.08c vātasyeva prajavo nānyena stomo vasiṣṭhā anvetave vaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:624: RV_7,033.09a ta in niṇyaṃ hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasravalśam abhi saṃ caranti |
GV01rv_hn07u:625: RV_7,033.09c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayanto 'psarasa upa sedur vasiṣṭhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:626: RV_7,033.10a vidyuto jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānam mitrāvaruṇā yad apaśyatāṃ tvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:627: RV_7,033.10c tat te janmotaikaṃ vasiṣṭhāgastyo yat tvā viśa ājabhāra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:628: RV_7,033.11a utāsi maitrāvaruṇo vasiṣṭhorvaśyā brahman manaso 'dhi jātaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:629: RV_7,033.11c drapsaṃ skannam brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvādadanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:630: RV_7,033.12a sa praketa ubhayasya pravidvān sahasradāna uta vā sadānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:631: RV_7,033.12c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayiṣyann apsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:632: RV_7,033.13a satre ha jātāv iṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam
GV01rv_hn07u:633: RV_7,033.13c tato ha māna ud iyāya madhyāt tato jātam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭham ||
GV01rv_hn07u:634: RV_7,033.14a ukthabhṛtaṃ sāmabhṛtam bibharti grāvāṇam bibhrat pra vadāty agre |
GV01rv_hn07u:635: RV_7,033.14c upainam ādhvaṃ sumanasyamānā ā vo gacchāti pratṛdo vasiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:636: RV_7,034.01 pra śukraitu devī manīṣā asmat sutaṣṭo ratho na vājī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:637: RV_7,034.02 viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitraṃ śṛṇvanty āpo adha kṣarantīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:638: RV_7,034.03 āpaś cid asmai pinvanta pṛthvīr vṛtreṣu śūrā maṃsanta ugrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:639: RV_7,034.04 ā dhūrṣv asmai dadhātāśvān indro na vajrī hiraṇyabāhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:640: RV_7,034.05 abhi pra sthātāheva yajñaṃ yāteva patman tmanā hinota ||
GV01rv_hn07u:641: RV_7,034.06 tmanā samatsu hinota yajñaṃ dadhāta ketuṃ janāya vīram ||
GV01rv_hn07u:642: RV_7,034.07 ud asya śuṣmād bhānur nārta bibharti bhāram pṛthivī na bhūma
GV01rv_hn07u:643: RV_7,034.08 hvayāmi devāṃ ayātur agne sādhann ṛtena dhiyaṃ dadhāmi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:644: RV_7,034.09 abhi vo devīṃ dhiyaṃ dadhidhvam pra vo devatrā vācaṃ kṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_hn07u:645: RV_7,034.10 ā caṣṭa āsām pātho nadīnāṃ varuṇa ugraḥ sahasracakṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:646: RV_7,034.11 rājā rāṣṭrānām peśo nadīnām anuttam asmai kṣatraṃ viśvāyu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:647: RV_7,034.12 aviṣṭo asmān viśvāsu vikṣv adyuṃ kṛṇota śaṃsaṃ ninitsoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:648: RV_7,034.13 vy etu didyud dviṣām aśevā yuyota viṣvag rapas tanūnām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:649: RV_7,034.14 avīn no agnir havyān namobhiḥ preṣṭho asmā adhāyi stomaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:650: RV_7,034.15 sajūr devebhir apāṃ napātaṃ sakhāyaṃ kṛdhvaṃ śivo no astu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:651: RV_7,034.16 abjām ukthair ahiṃ gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnāṃ rajassu ṣīdan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:652: RV_7,034.17 mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhān mā yajño asya sridhad ṛtāyoḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:653: RV_7,034.18 uta na eṣu nṛṣu śravo dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhanto aryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:654: RV_7,034.19 tapanti śatruṃ svar ṇa bhūmā mahāsenāso amebhir eṣām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:655: RV_7,034.20 ā yan naḥ patnīr gamanty acchā tvaṣṭā supāṇir dadhātu vīrān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:656: RV_7,034.21 prati na stomaṃ tvaṣṭā juṣeta syād asme aramatir vasūyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:657: RV_7,034.22a tā no rāsan rātiṣāco vasūny ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu |
GV01rv_hn07u:658: RV_7,034.22c varūtrībhiḥ suśaraṇo no astu tvaṣṭā sudatro vi dadhātu rāyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:659: RV_7,034.23a tan no rāyaḥ parvatās tan na āpas tad rātiṣāca oṣadhīr uta dyauḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:660: RV_7,034.23c vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣā ubhe rodasī pari pāsato naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:661: RV_7,034.24a anu tad urvī rodasī jihātām anu dyukṣo varuṇa indrasakhā |
GV01rv_hn07u:662: RV_7,034.24c anu viśve maruto ye sahāso rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇaṃ dhiyadhyai ||
GV01rv_hn07u:663: RV_7,034.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta |
GV01rv_hn07u:664: RV_7,034.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:665: RV_7,035.01a śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā
GV01rv_hn07u:666: RV_7,035.01c śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau
GV01rv_hn07u:667: RV_7,035.02a śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purandhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:668: RV_7,035.02c śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu
GV01rv_hn07u:669: RV_7,035.03a śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu
GV01rv_hn07u:671: RV_7,035.03c śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:672: RV_7,035.04a śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam
GV01rv_hn07u:673: RV_7,035.04c śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:674: RV_7,035.05a śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu
GV01rv_hn07u:675: RV_7,035.05c śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patir astu jiṣṇuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:676: RV_7,035.06a śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:678: RV_7,035.06c śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:679: RV_7,035.07a śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u
GV01rv_hn07u:681: RV_7,035.07c śaṃ naḥ svarūṇām mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:682: RV_7,035.08a śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ naś catasraḥ pradiśo bhavantu |
GV01rv_hn07u:683: RV_7,035.08c śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:684: RV_7,035.09a śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:686: RV_7,035.09c śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:687: RV_7,035.10a śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:688: RV_7,035.10c śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir
GV01rv_hn07u:690: RV_7,035.11a śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir
GV01rv_hn07u:692: RV_7,035.11c śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:693: RV_7,035.12a śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:694: RV_7,035.12c śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu
GV01rv_hn07u:695: RV_7,035.13a śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śaṃ no 'hir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:696: RV_7,035.13c śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnir bhavatu devagopā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:697: RV_7,035.14a ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantedam brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:698: RV_7,035.14c śṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:699: RV_7,035.15a ye devānāṃ yajñiyā yajñiyānām manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:700: RV_7,035.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:701: RV_7,036.01a pra brahmaitu sadanād ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryo gāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:702: RV_7,036.01c vi sānunā pṛthivī sasra urvī pṛthu pratīkam adhy edhe agniḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:703: RV_7,036.02a imāṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktim iṣaṃ na kṛṇve asurā navīyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:704: RV_7,036.02c ino vām anyaḥ padavīr adabdho janaṃ ca mitro yatati bruvāṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:705: RV_7,036.03a ā vātasya dhrajato ranta ityā apīpayanta dhenavo na sūdāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:706: RV_7,036.03c maho divaḥ sadane jāyamāno 'cikradad vṛṣabhaḥ sasminn ūdhan
GV01rv_hn07u:707: RV_7,036.04a girā ya etā yunajad dharī ta indra priyā surathā śūra dhāyū |
GV01rv_hn07u:708: RV_7,036.04c pra yo manyuṃ ririkṣato mināty ā sukratum aryamaṇaṃ vavṛtyām
GV01rv_hn07u:709: RV_7,036.05a yajante asya sakhyaṃ vayaś ca namasvinaḥ sva ṛtasya dhāman |
GV01rv_hn07u:710: RV_7,036.05c vi pṛkṣo bābadhe nṛbhi stavāna idaṃ namo rudrāya preṣṭham ||
GV01rv_hn07u:711: RV_7,036.06a ā yat sākaṃ yaśaso vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhumātā |
GV01rv_hn07u:712: RV_7,036.06c yāḥ suṣvayanta sudughāḥ sudhārā abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:713: RV_7,036.07a uta tye no maruto mandasānā dhiyaṃ tokaṃ ca vājino 'vantu |
GV01rv_hn07u:714: RV_7,036.07c mā naḥ pari khyad akṣarā caranty avīvṛdhan yujyaṃ te rayiṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:715: RV_7,036.08a pra vo mahīm aramatiṃ kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ vidathyaṃ na
GV01rv_hn07u:717: RV_7,036.08c bhagaṃ dhiyo 'vitāraṃ no asyāḥ sātau vājaṃ rātiṣācam purandhim ||
GV01rv_hn07u:718: RV_7,036.09a acchāyaṃ vo marutaḥ śloka etv acchā viṣṇuṃ niṣiktapām avobhiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:719: RV_7,036.09c uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayo dhur yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:720: RV_7,037.01a ā vo vāhiṣṭho vahatu stavadhyai ratho vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:721: RV_7,037.01c abhi tripṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somair made suśiprā mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:722: RV_7,037.02a yūyaṃ ha ratnam maghavatsu dhattha svardṛśa ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktam |
GV01rv_hn07u:723: RV_7,037.02c saṃ yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvaṃ vi no rādhāṃsi matibhir dayadhvam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:724: RV_7,037.03a uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇam maho arbhasya vasuno vibhāge |
GV01rv_hn07u:725: RV_7,037.03c ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:726: RV_7,037.04a tvam indra svayaśā ṛbhukṣā vājo na sādhur astam eṣy ṛkvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:727: RV_7,037.04c vayaṃ nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvanto harivo vasiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:728: RV_7,037.05a sanitāsi pravato dāśuṣe cid yābhir viveṣo haryaśva dhībhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:729: RV_7,037.05c vavanmā nu te yujyābhir ūtī kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyeḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:730: RV_7,037.06a vāsayasīva vedhasas tvaṃ naḥ kadā na indra vacaso bubodhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:731: RV_7,037.06c astaṃ tātyā dhiyā rayiṃ suvīram pṛkṣo no arvā ny uhīta vājī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:732: RV_7,037.07a abhi yaṃ devī nirṛtiś cid īśe nakṣanta indraṃ śaradaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:734: RV_7,037.07c upa tribandhur jaradaṣṭim ety asvaveśaṃ yaṃ kṛṇavanta martāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:735: RV_7,037.08a ā no rādhāṃsi savita stavadhyā ā rāyo yantu parvatasya rātau
GV01rv_hn07u:736: RV_7,037.08c sadā no divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:737: RV_7,038.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīm amatiṃ yām aśiśret |
GV01rv_hn07u:738: RV_7,038.01c nūnam bhago havyo mānuṣebhir vi yo ratnā purūvasur dadhāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:739: RV_7,038.02a ud u tiṣṭha savitaḥ śrudhy asya hiraṇyapāṇe prabhṛtāv ṛtasya
GV01rv_hn07u:740: RV_7,038.02c vy urvīm pṛthvīm amatiṃ sṛjāna ā nṛbhyo martabhojanaṃ suvānaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:741: RV_7,038.03a api ṣṭutaḥ savitā devo astu yam ā cid viśve vasavo gṛṇanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:742: RV_7,038.03c sa na stomān namasyaś cano dhād viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhir ni sūrīn ||
GV01rv_hn07u:743: RV_7,038.04a abhi yaṃ devy aditir gṛṇāti savaṃ devasya savitur juṣāṇā |
GV01rv_hn07u:744: RV_7,038.04c abhi samrājo varuṇo gṛṇanty abhi mitrāso aryamā sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:745: RV_7,038.05a abhi ye mitho vanuṣaḥ sapante rātiṃ divo rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:746: RV_7,038.05c ahir budhnya uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtry ekadhenubhir ni pātu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:747: RV_7,038.06a anu tan no jāspatir maṃsīṣṭa ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:748: RV_7,038.06c bhagam ugro 'vase johavīti bhagam anugro adha yāti ratnam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:749: RV_7,038.07a śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:750: RV_7,038.07c jambhayanto 'hiṃ vṛkaṃ rakṣāṃsi sanemy asmad yuyavann amīvāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:751: RV_7,038.08a vāje-vāje 'vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:752: RV_7,038.08c asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:753: RV_7,039.01a ūrdhvo agniḥ sumatiṃ vasvo aśret pratīcī jūrṇir devatātim eti
GV01rv_hn07u:754: RV_7,039.01c bhejāte adrī rathyeva panthām ṛtaṃ hotā na iṣito yajāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:755: RV_7,039.02a pra vāvṛje suprayā barhir eṣām ā viśpatīva bīriṭa iyāte |
GV01rv_hn07u:756: RV_7,039.02c viśām aktor uṣasaḥ pūrvahūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:757: RV_7,039.03a jmayā atra vasavo ranta devā urāv antarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:758: RV_7,039.03c arvāk patha urujrayaḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ śrotā dūtasya jagmuṣo no asya
GV01rv_hn07u:759: RV_7,039.04a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmāḥ sadhasthaṃ viśve abhi santi
GV01rv_hn07u:761: RV_7,039.04c tāṃ adhvara uśato yakṣy agne śruṣṭī bhagaṃ nāsatyā purandhim
GV01rv_hn07u:762: RV_7,039.05a āgne giro diva ā pṛthivyā mitraṃ vaha varuṇam indram agnim |
GV01rv_hn07u:763: RV_7,039.05c āryamaṇam aditiṃ viṣṇum eṣāṃ sarasvatī maruto mādayantām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:764: RV_7,039.06a rare havyam matibhir yajñiyānāṃ nakṣat kāmam martyānām asinvan |
GV01rv_hn07u:765: RV_7,039.06c dhātā rayim avidasyaṃ sadāsāṃ sakṣīmahi yujyebhir nu devaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:766: RV_7,039.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:767: RV_7,039.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:769: RV_7,040.01a o śruṣṭir vidathyā sam etu prati stomaṃ dadhīmahi turāṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:770: RV_7,040.01c yad adya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāmāsya ratnino vibhāge ||
GV01rv_hn07u:771: RV_7,040.02a mitras tan no varuṇo rodasī ca dyubhaktam indro aryamā dadātu
GV01rv_hn07u:772: RV_7,040.02c dideṣṭu devy aditī rekṇo vāyuś ca yan niyuvaite bhagaś ca ||
GV01rv_hn07u:773: RV_7,040.03a sed ugro astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yam martyam pṛṣadaśvā avātha |
GV01rv_hn07u:774: RV_7,040.03c utem agniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetāsti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:775: RV_7,040.04a ayaṃ hi netā varuṇa ṛtasya mitro rājāno aryamāpo dhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:776: RV_7,040.04c suhavā devy aditir anarvā te no aṃho ati parṣann ariṣṭān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:777: RV_7,040.05a asya devasya mīḷhuṣo vayā viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:778: RV_7,040.05c vide hi rudro rudriyam mahitvaṃ yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat ||
GV01rv_hn07u:779: RV_7,040.06a mātra pūṣann āghṛṇa irasyo varūtrī yad rātiṣācaś ca rāsan |
GV01rv_hn07u:780: RV_7,040.06c mayobhuvo no arvanto ni pāntu vṛṣṭim parijmā vāto dadātu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:781: RV_7,040.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:782: RV_7,040.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:784: RV_7,041.01a prātar agnim prātar indraṃ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn07u:785: RV_7,041.01c prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ
GV01rv_hn07u:787: RV_7,041.02a prātarjitam bhagam ugraṃ huvema vayam putram aditer yo vidhartā |
GV01rv_hn07u:788: RV_7,041.02c ādhraś cid yam manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yam bhagam bhakṣīty āha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:789: RV_7,041.03a bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan
GV01rv_hn07u:791: RV_7,041.03c bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:792: RV_7,041.04a utedānīm bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:793: RV_7,041.04c utoditā maghavan sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:794: RV_7,041.05a bhaga eva bhagavāṃ astu devās tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma |
GV01rv_hn07u:795: RV_7,041.05c taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:796: RV_7,041.06a sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya |
GV01rv_hn07u:797: RV_7,041.06c arvācīnaṃ vasuvidam bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu
GV01rv_hn07u:798: RV_7,041.07a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:799: RV_7,041.07c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:800: RV_7,042.01a pra brahmāṇo aṅgiraso nakṣanta pra krandanur nabhanyasya vetu |
GV01rv_hn07u:801: RV_7,042.01c pra dhenava udapruto navanta yujyātām adrī adhvarasya peśaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:802: RV_7,042.02a sugas te agne sanavitto adhvā yukṣvā sute harito rohitaś ca |
GV01rv_hn07u:803: RV_7,042.02c ye vā sadmann aruṣā vīravāho huve devānāṃ janimāni sattaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:804: RV_7,042.03a sam u vo yajñam mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandro ririca upāke |
GV01rv_hn07u:805: RV_7,042.03c yajasva su purvaṇīka devān ā yajñiyām aramatiṃ vavṛtyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:806: RV_7,042.04a yadā vīrasya revato duroṇe syonaśīr atithir āciketat |
GV01rv_hn07u:807: RV_7,042.04c suprīto agniḥ sudhito dama ā sa viśe dāti vāryam iyatyai ||
GV01rv_hn07u:808: RV_7,042.05a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva marutsv indre yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:809: RV_7,042.05c ā naktā barhiḥ sadatām uṣāsośantā mitrāvaruṇā yajeha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:810: RV_7,042.06a evāgniṃ sahasyaṃ vasiṣṭho rāyaskāmo viśvapsnyasya staut |
GV01rv_hn07u:811: RV_7,042.06c iṣaṃ rayim paprathad vājam asme yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:813: RV_7,043.01a pra vo yajñeṣu devayanto arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ pṛthivī iṣadhyai |
GV01rv_hn07u:814: RV_7,043.01c yeṣām brahmāṇy asamāni viprā viṣvag viyanti vanino na śākhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:815: RV_7,043.02a pra yajña etu hetvo na saptir ud yacchadhvaṃ samanaso
GV01rv_hn07u:817: RV_7,043.02c stṛṇīta barhir adhvarāya sādhūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūny asthuḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:818: RV_7,043.03a ā putrāso na mātaraṃ vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāso barhiṣaḥ sadantu
GV01rv_hn07u:819: RV_7,043.03c ā viśvācī vidathyām anaktv agne mā no devatātā mṛdhas kaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:820: RV_7,043.04a te sīṣapanta joṣam ā yajatrā ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughā duhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:821: RV_7,043.04c jyeṣṭhaṃ vo adya maha ā vasūnām ā gantana samanaso yati ṣṭha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:822: RV_7,043.05a evā no agne vikṣv ā daśasya tvayā vayaṃ sahasāvann āskrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:823: RV_7,043.05c rāyā yujā sadhamādo ariṣṭā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:824: RV_7,044.01a dadhikrāṃ vaḥ prathamam aśvinoṣasam agniṃ samiddham bhagam ūtaye huve |
GV01rv_hn07u:825: RV_7,044.01c indraṃ viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:826: RV_7,044.02a dadhikrām u namasā bodhayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:827: RV_7,044.02c iḷāṃ devīm barhiṣi sādayanto 'śvinā viprā suhavā huvema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:828: RV_7,044.03a dadhikrāvāṇam bubudhāno agnim upa bruva uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām |
GV01rv_hn07u:829: RV_7,044.03c bradhnam māṃścator varuṇasya babhruṃ te viśvāsmad duritā yāvayantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:830: RV_7,044.04a dadhikrāvā prathamo vājy arvāgre rathānām bhavati prajānan |
GV01rv_hn07u:831: RV_7,044.04c saṃvidāna uṣasā sūryeṇādityebhir vasubhir aṅgirobhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:832: RV_7,044.05a ā no dadhikrāḥ pathyām anaktv ṛtasya panthām anvetavā u |
GV01rv_hn07u:833: RV_7,044.05c śṛṇotu no daivyaṃ śardho agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣā amūrāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:834: RV_7,045.01a ā devo yātu savitā suratno 'ntarikṣaprā vahamāno aśvaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:835: RV_7,045.01c haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi niveśayañ ca prasuvañ ca bhūma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:836: RV_7,045.02a ud asya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divo antāṃ anaṣṭām |
GV01rv_hn07u:837: RV_7,045.02c nūnaṃ so asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraś cid asmā anu dād apasyām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:838: RV_7,045.03a sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣad vasupatir vasūni |
GV01rv_hn07u:839: RV_7,045.03c viśrayamāṇo amatim urūcīm martabhojanam adha rāsate naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:840: RV_7,045.04a imā giraḥ savitāraṃ sujihvam pūrṇagabhastim īḷate supāṇim |
GV01rv_hn07u:841: RV_7,045.04c citraṃ vayo bṛhad asme dadhātu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:842: RV_7,046.01a imā rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne
GV01rv_hn07u:843: RV_7,046.01c aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigmāyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:844: RV_7,046.02a sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati |
GV01rv_hn07u:845: RV_7,046.02c avann avantīr upa no duraś carānamīvo rudra jāsu no bhava ||
GV01rv_hn07u:846: RV_7,046.03a yā te didyud avasṛṣṭā divas pari kṣmayā carati pari sā vṛṇaktu naḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:847: RV_7,046.03c sahasraṃ te svapivāta bheṣajā mā nas tokeṣu tanayeṣu rīriṣaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:848: RV_7,046.04a mā no vadhī rudra mā parā dā mā te bhūma prasitau hīḷitasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:849: RV_7,046.04c ā no bhaja barhiṣi jīvaśaṃse yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:850: RV_7,047.01a āpo yaṃ vaḥ prathamaṃ devayanta indrapānam ūrmim akṛṇvateḷaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:851: RV_7,047.01c taṃ vo vayaṃ śucim aripram adya ghṛtapruṣam madhumantaṃ vanema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:852: RV_7,047.02a tam ūrmim āpo madhumattamaṃ vo 'pāṃ napād avatv āśuhemā |
GV01rv_hn07u:853: RV_7,047.02c yasminn indro vasubhir mādayāte tam aśyāma devayanto vo adya
GV01rv_hn07u:854: RV_7,047.03a śatapavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīr devīr devānām api yanti pāthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:855: RV_7,047.03c tā indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyo havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota ||
GV01rv_hn07u:856: RV_7,047.04a yāḥ sūryo raśmibhir ātatāna yābhya indro aradad gātum ūrmim |
GV01rv_hn07u:857: RV_7,047.04c te sindhavo varivo dhātanā no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:858: RV_7,048.01a ṛbhukṣaṇo vājā mādayadhvam asme naro maghavānaḥ sutasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:859: RV_7,048.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ kratavo na yātāṃ vibhvo rathaṃ naryaṃ vartayantu
GV01rv_hn07u:860: RV_7,048.02a ṛbhur ṛbhubhir abhi vaḥ syāma vibhvo vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi
GV01rv_hn07u:861: RV_7,048.02c vājo asmāṃ avatu vājasātāv indreṇa yujā taruṣema vṛtram ||
GV01rv_hn07u:862: RV_7,048.03a te cid dhi pūrvīr abhi santi śāsā viśvāṃ arya uparatāti vanvan |
GV01rv_hn07u:863: RV_7,048.03c indro vibhvāṃ ṛbhukṣā vājo aryaḥ śatror mithatyā kṛṇavan vi
GV01rv_hn07u:865: RV_7,048.04a nū devāso varivaḥ kartanā no bhūta no viśve 'vase sajoṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:866: RV_7,048.04c sam asme iṣaṃ vasavo dadīran yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:867: RV_7,049.01a samudrajyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānā yanty aniviśamānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:868: RV_7,049.01c indro yā vajrī vṛṣabho rarāda tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:869: RV_7,049.02a yā āpo divyā uta vā sravanti khanitrimā uta vā yāḥ svayañjāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:870: RV_7,049.02c samudrārthā yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu
GV01rv_hn07u:871: RV_7,049.03a yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyañ janānām |
GV01rv_hn07u:872: RV_7,049.03c madhuścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:873: RV_7,049.04a yāsu rājā varuṇo yāsu somo viśve devā yāsūrjam madanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:874: RV_7,049.04c vaiśvānaro yāsv agniḥ praviṣṭas tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu
GV01rv_hn07u:875: RV_7,050.01a ā mām mitrāvaruṇeha rakṣataṃ kulāyayad viśvayan mā na ā gan |
GV01rv_hn07u:876: RV_7,050.01c ajakāvaṃ durdṛśīkaṃ tiro dadhe mā mām padyena rapasā vidat
GV01rv_hn07u:878: RV_7,050.02a yad vijāman paruṣi vandanam bhuvad aṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat |
GV01rv_hn07u:879: RV_7,050.02c agniṣ ṭac chocann apa bādhatām ito mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:880: RV_7,050.03a yac chalmalau bhavati yan nadīṣu yad oṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate
GV01rv_hn07u:882: RV_7,050.03c viśve devā nir itas tat suvantu mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:883: RV_7,050.04a yāḥ pravato nivata udvata udanvatīr anudakāś ca yāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:884: RV_7,050.04c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ śivā devīr aśipadā bhavantu sarvā nadyo aśimidā bhavantu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:885: RV_7,051.01a ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena |
GV01rv_hn07u:886: RV_7,051.01c anāgāstve adititve turāsa imaṃ yajñaṃ dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:887: RV_7,051.02a ādityāso aditir mādayantām mitro aryamā varuṇo rajiṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:888: RV_7,051.02c asmākaṃ santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somam avase no adya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:889: RV_7,051.03a ādityā viśve marutaś ca viśve devāś ca viśva ṛbhavaś ca viśve |
GV01rv_hn07u:890: RV_7,051.03c indro agnir aśvinā tuṣṭuvānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:891: RV_7,052.01a ādityāso aditayaḥ syāma pūr devatrā vasavo martyatrā |
GV01rv_hn07u:892: RV_7,052.01c sanema mitrāvaruṇā sananto bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:893: RV_7,052.02a mitras tan no varuṇo māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:894: RV_7,052.02c mā vo bhujemānyajātam eno mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve ||
GV01rv_hn07u:895: RV_7,052.03a turaṇyavo 'ṅgiraso nakṣanta ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:896: RV_7,052.03c pitā ca tan no mahān yajatro viśve devāḥ samanaso juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:897: RV_7,053.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādha īḷe bṛhatī yajatre
GV01rv_hn07u:898: RV_7,053.01c te cid dhi pūrve kavayo gṛṇantaḥ puro mahī dadhire devaputre
GV01rv_hn07u:899: RV_7,053.02a pra pūrvaje pitarā navyasībhir gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sadane ṛtasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:900: RV_7,053.02c ā no dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātam mahi vāṃ varūtham ||
GV01rv_hn07u:901: RV_7,053.03a uto hi vāṃ ratnadheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse |
GV01rv_hn07u:902: RV_7,053.03c asme dhattaṃ yad asad askṛdhoyu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:904: RV_7,054.01a vāstoṣ pate prati jānīhy asmān svāveśo anamīvo bhavā naḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:905: RV_7,054.01c yat tvemahe prati tan no juṣasva śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade ||
GV01rv_hn07u:906: RV_7,054.02a vāstoṣ pate prataraṇo na edhi gayasphāno gobhir aśvebhir indo
GV01rv_hn07u:907: RV_7,054.02c ajarāsas te sakhye syāma piteva putrān prati no juṣasva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:908: RV_7,054.03a vāstoṣ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā |
GV01rv_hn07u:909: RV_7,054.03c pāhi kṣema uta yoge varaṃ no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:910: RV_7,055.01a amīvahā vāstoṣ pate viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan |
GV01rv_hn07u:912: RV_7,055.02a yad arjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yacchase |
GV01rv_hn07u:913: RV_7,055.02c vīva bhrājanta ṛṣṭaya upa srakveṣu bapsato ni ṣu svapa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:914: RV_7,055.03a stenaṃ rāya sārameya taskaraṃ vā punaḥsara |
GV01rv_hn07u:915: RV_7,055.03c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:916: RV_7,055.04a tvaṃ sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:917: RV_7,055.04c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:918: RV_7,055.05a sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:919: RV_7,055.05c sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastv ayam abhito janaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:920: RV_7,055.06a ya āste yaś ca carati yaś ca paśyati no janaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:921: RV_7,055.06c teṣāṃ saṃ hanmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:922: RV_7,055.07a sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat |
GV01rv_hn07u:923: RV_7,055.07c tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janān svāpayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:924: RV_7,055.08a proṣṭheśayā vahyeśayā nārīr yās talpaśīvarīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:925: RV_7,055.08c striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhās tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:926: RV_7,056.01a ka īṃ vyaktā naraḥ sanīḷā rudrasya maryā adha svaśvāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:927: RV_7,056.02a nakir hy eṣāṃ janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mitho janitram ||
GV01rv_hn07u:928: RV_7,056.03a abhi svapūbhir mitho vapanta vātasvanasaḥ śyenā aspṛdhran ||
GV01rv_hn07u:929: RV_7,056.04a etāni dhīro niṇyā ciketa pṛśnir yad ūdho mahī jabhāra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:930: RV_7,056.05a sā viṭ suvīrā marudbhir astu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:931: RV_7,056.06a yāmaṃ yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślā ojobhir ugrāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:932: RV_7,056.07a ugraṃ va oja sthirā śavāṃsy adhā marudbhir gaṇas tuviṣmān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:933: RV_7,056.08a śubhro vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhunir munir iva śardhasya
GV01rv_hn07u:935: RV_7,056.09a sanemy asmad yuyota didyum mā vo durmatir iha praṇaṅ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:936: RV_7,056.10a priyā vo nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpan maruto vāvaśānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:937: RV_7,056.11a svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ suniṣkā uta svayaṃ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:938: RV_7,056.12a śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:939: RV_7,056.12c ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ chucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:940: RV_7,056.13a aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣassu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:941: RV_7,056.13c vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yacchamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:942: RV_7,056.14a pra budhnyā va īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavas tiradhvam
GV01rv_hn07u:943: RV_7,056.14c sahasriyaṃ damyam bhāgam etaṃ gṛhamedhīyam maruto juṣadhvam
GV01rv_hn07u:944: RV_7,056.15a yadi stutasya maruto adhīthetthā viprasya vājino havīman |
GV01rv_hn07u:945: RV_7,056.15c makṣū rāyaḥ suvīryasya dāta nū cid yam anya ādabhad arāvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:946: RV_7,056.16a atyāso na ye marutaḥ svañco yakṣadṛśo na śubhayanta maryāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:947: RV_7,056.16c te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavo na śubhrā vatsāso na prakrīḷinaḥ payodhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:948: RV_7,056.17a daśasyanto no maruto mṛḷantu varivasyanto rodasī sumeke |
GV01rv_hn07u:949: RV_7,056.17c āre gohā nṛhā vadho vo astu sumnebhir asme vasavo namadhvam
GV01rv_hn07u:950: RV_7,056.18a ā vo hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīṃ rātim maruto gṛṇānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:951: RV_7,056.18c ya īvato vṛṣaṇo asti gopāḥ so advayāvī havate va ukthaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:952: RV_7,056.19a ime turam maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasa ā namanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:953: RV_7,056.19c ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato ni pānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:954: RV_7,056.20a ime radhraṃ cin maruto junanti bhṛmiṃ cid yathā vasavo
GV01rv_hn07u:956: RV_7,056.20c apa bādhadhvaṃ vṛṣaṇas tamāṃsi dhatta viśvaṃ tanayaṃ tokam asme ||
GV01rv_hn07u:957: RV_7,056.21a mā vo dātrān maruto nir arāma mā paścād daghma rathyo vibhāge |
GV01rv_hn07u:958: RV_7,056.21c ā na spārhe bhajatanā vasavye yad īṃ sujātaṃ vṛṣaṇo vo asti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:959: RV_7,056.22a saṃ yad dhananta manyubhir janāsaḥ śūrā yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu |
GV01rv_hn07u:960: RV_7,056.22c adha smā no maruto rudriyāsas trātāro bhūta pṛtanāsv aryaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:961: RV_7,056.23a bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇy ukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit
GV01rv_hn07u:962: RV_7,056.23c marudbhir ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhir it sanitā vājam arvā
GV01rv_hn07u:963: RV_7,056.24a asme vīro marutaḥ śuṣmy astu janānāṃ yo asuro vidhartā |
GV01rv_hn07u:964: RV_7,056.24c apo yena sukṣitaye taremādha svam oko abhi vaḥ syāma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:965: RV_7,056.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta |
GV01rv_hn07u:966: RV_7,056.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:967: RV_7,057.01a madhvo vo nāma mārutaṃ yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:968: RV_7,057.01c ye rejayanti rodasī cid urvī pinvanty utsaṃ yad ayāsur ugrāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:969: RV_7,057.02a nicetāro hi maruto gṛṇantam praṇetāro yajamānasya manma |
GV01rv_hn07u:970: RV_7,057.02c asmākam adya vidatheṣu barhir ā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:971: RV_7,057.03a naitāvad anye maruto yatheme bhrājante rukmair āyudhais tanūbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:972: RV_7,057.03c ā rodasī viśvapiśaḥ piśānāḥ samānam añjy añjate śubhe kam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:973: RV_7,057.04a ṛdhak sā vo maruto didyud astu yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma |
GV01rv_hn07u:974: RV_7,057.04c mā vas tasyām api bhūmā yajatrā asme vo astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:975: RV_7,057.05a kṛte cid atra maruto raṇantānavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:976: RV_7,057.05c pra ṇo 'vata sumatibhir yajatrāḥ pra vājebhis tirata puṣyase
GV01rv_hn07u:978: RV_7,057.06a uta stutāso maruto vyantu viśvebhir nāmabhir naro havīṃṣi |
GV01rv_hn07u:979: RV_7,057.06c dadāta no amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtā maghāni ||
