GV01rv_hn07u:980: RV_7,057.07a ā stutāso maruto viśva ūtī acchā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta |
GV01rv_hn07u:981: RV_7,057.07c ye nas tmanā śatino vardhayanti yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:983: RV_7,058.01a pra sākamukṣe arcatā gaṇāya yo daivyasya dhāmnas tuviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn07u:984: RV_7,058.01c uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākaṃ nirṛter avaṃśāt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:985: RV_7,058.02a janūś cid vo marutas tveṣyeṇa bhīmāsas tuvimanyavo 'yāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:986: RV_7,058.02c pra ye mahobhir ojasota santi viśvo vo yāman bhayate svardṛk
GV01rv_hn07u:987: RV_7,058.03a bṛhad vayo maghavadbhyo dadhāta jujoṣann in marutaḥ suṣṭutiṃ naḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:988: RV_7,058.03c gato nādhvā vi tirāti jantum pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tireta
GV01rv_hn07u:989: RV_7,058.04a yuṣmoto vipro marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmoto arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī |
GV01rv_hn07u:990: RV_7,058.04c yuṣmotaḥ samrāḷ uta hanti vṛtram pra tad vo astu dhūtayo deṣṇam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:991: RV_7,058.05a tāṃ ā rudrasya mīḷhuṣo vivāse kuvin naṃsante marutaḥ punar
GV01rv_hn07u:993: RV_7,058.05c yat sasvartā jihīḷire yad āvir ava tad ena īmahe turāṇām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:994: RV_7,058.06a pra sā vāci suṣṭutir maghonām idaṃ sūktam maruto juṣanta |
GV01rv_hn07u:995: RV_7,058.06c ārāc cid dveṣo vṛṣaṇo yuyota yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:996: RV_7,059.01a yaṃ trāyadhva idam-idaṃ devāso yaṃ ca nayatha |
GV01rv_hn07u:997: RV_7,059.01c tasmā agne varuṇa mitrāryaman marutaḥ śarma yacchata ||
GV01rv_hn07u:998: RV_7,059.02a yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priya ījānas tarati dviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:999: RV_7,059.02c pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1000: RV_7,059.03a nahi vaś caramaṃ cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate |
GV01rv_hn07u:1001: RV_7,059.03c asmākam adya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1002: RV_7,059.04a nahi va ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmā arādhvaṃ naraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1003: RV_7,059.04c abhi va āvart sumatir navīyasī tūyaṃ yāta pipīṣavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1004: RV_7,059.05a o ṣu ghṛṣvirādhaso yātanāndhāṃsi pītaye |
GV01rv_hn07u:1005: RV_7,059.05c imā vo havyā maruto rare hi kam mo ṣv anyatra gantana ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1006: RV_7,059.06a ā ca no barhiḥ sadatāvitā ca na spārhāṇi dātave vasu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1007: RV_7,059.06c asredhanto marutaḥ somye madhau svāheha mādayādhvai ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1008: RV_7,059.07a sasvaś cid dhi tanvaḥ śumbhamānā ā haṃsāso nīlapṛṣṭhā apaptan
GV01rv_hn07u:1009: RV_7,059.07c viśvaṃ śardho abhito mā ni ṣeda naro na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1010: RV_7,059.08a yo no maruto abhi durhṛṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsati
GV01rv_hn07u:1011: RV_7,059.08c druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā hantanā tam
GV01rv_hn07u:1012: RV_7,059.09a sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana |
GV01rv_hn07u:1014: RV_7,059.10a gṛhamedhāsa ā gata maruto māpa bhūtana |
GV01rv_hn07u:1016: RV_7,059.11a iheha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūryatvacaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1019: RV_7,059.12c urvārukam iva bandhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1020: RV_7,060.01a yad adya sūrya bravo 'nāgā udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1021: RV_7,060.01c vayaṃ devatrādite syāma tava priyāso aryaman gṛṇantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1022: RV_7,060.02a eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛcakṣā ubhe ud eti sūryo abhi jman |
GV01rv_hn07u:1023: RV_7,060.02c viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca gopā ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan
GV01rv_hn07u:1024: RV_7,060.03a ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthād yā īṃ vahanti sūryaṃ ghṛtācīḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1025: RV_7,060.03c dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ saṃ yo yūtheva janimāni caṣṭe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1026: RV_7,060.04a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanto asthur ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1027: RV_7,060.04c yasmā ādityā adhvano radanti mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1028: RV_7,060.05a ime cetāro anṛtasya bhūrer mitro aryamā varuṇo hi santi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1029: RV_7,060.05c ima ṛtasya vāvṛdhur duroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrā aditer adabdhāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1030: RV_7,060.06a ime mitro varuṇo dūḷabhāso 'cetasaṃ cic citayanti dakṣaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1031: RV_7,060.06c api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatantas tiraś cid aṃhaḥ supathā nayanti
GV01rv_hn07u:1032: RV_7,060.07a ime divo animiṣā pṛthivyāś cikitvāṃso acetasaṃ nayanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1033: RV_7,060.07c pravrāje cin nadyo gādham asti pāraṃ no asya viṣpitasya
GV01rv_hn07u:1035: RV_7,060.08a yad gopāvad aditiḥ śarma bhadram mitro yacchanti varuṇaḥ sudāse |
GV01rv_hn07u:1036: RV_7,060.08c tasminn ā tokaṃ tanayaṃ dadhānā mā karma devaheḷanaṃ turāsaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1037: RV_7,060.09a ava vediṃ hotrābhir yajeta ripaḥ kāś cid varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1038: RV_7,060.09c pari dveṣobhir aryamā vṛṇaktūruṃ sudāse vṛṣaṇā u lokam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1039: RV_7,060.10a sasvaś cid dhi samṛtis tveṣy eṣām apīcyena sahasā sahante |
GV01rv_hn07u:1040: RV_7,060.10c yuṣmad bhiyā vṛṣaṇo rejamānā dakṣasya cin mahinā mṛḷatā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1041: RV_7,060.11a yo brahmaṇe sumatim āyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1042: RV_7,060.11c sīkṣanta manyum maghavāno arya uru kṣayāya cakrire sudhātu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1043: RV_7,060.12a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri |
GV01rv_hn07u:1044: RV_7,060.12c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1045: RV_7,061.01a ud vāṃ cakṣur varuṇa supratīkaṃ devayor eti sūryas tatanvān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1046: RV_7,061.01c abhi yo viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyum martyeṣv ā ciketa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1047: RV_7,061.02a pra vāṃ sa mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvā vipro manmāni dīrghaśrud iyarti
GV01rv_hn07u:1048: RV_7,061.02c yasya brahmāṇi sukratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1050: RV_7,061.03a proror mitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra diva ṛṣvād bṛhataḥ sudānū |
GV01rv_hn07u:1051: RV_7,061.03c spaśo dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣv ṛdhag yato animiṣaṃ rakṣamāṇā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1052: RV_7,061.04a śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmo rodasī badbadhe mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1053: RV_7,061.04c ayan māsā ayajvanām avīrāḥ pra yajñamanmā vṛjanaṃ tirāte ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1054: RV_7,061.05a amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇāv imā vāṃ na yāsu citraṃ dadṛśe na yakṣam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1055: RV_7,061.05c druhaḥ sacante anṛtā janānāṃ na vāṃ niṇyāny acite abhūvan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1056: RV_7,061.06a sam u vāṃ yajñam mahayaṃ namobhir huve vām mitrāvaruṇā
GV01rv_hn07u:1058: RV_7,061.06c pra vām manmāny ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣann imāni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1059: RV_7,061.07a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri |
GV01rv_hn07u:1060: RV_7,061.07c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1061: RV_7,062.01a ut sūryo bṛhad arcīṃṣy aśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1062: RV_7,062.01c samo divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1063: RV_7,062.02a sa sūrya prati puro na ud gā ebhi stomebhir etaśebhir evaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1064: RV_7,062.02c pra no mitrāya varuṇāya voco 'nāgaso aryamṇe agnaye ca ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1065: RV_7,062.03a vi naḥ sahasraṃ śurudho radantv ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1066: RV_7,062.03c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkam ā naḥ kāmam pūpurantu
GV01rv_hn07u:1068: RV_7,062.04a dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ no ye vāṃ jajñuḥ sujanimāna ṛṣve |
GV01rv_hn07u:1069: RV_7,062.04c mā heḷe bhūma varuṇasya vāyor mā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām
GV01rv_hn07u:1070: RV_7,062.05a pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase na ā no gavyūtim ukṣataṃ ghṛtena |
GV01rv_hn07u:1071: RV_7,062.05c ā no jane śravayataṃ yuvānā śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1072: RV_7,062.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1073: RV_7,062.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1074: RV_7,063.01a ud v eti subhago viśvacakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryo mānuṣāṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1075: RV_7,063.01c cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasya devaś carmeva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1076: RV_7,063.02a ud v eti prasavītā janānām mahān ketur arṇavaḥ sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1077: RV_7,063.02c samānaṃ cakram paryāvivṛtsan yad etaśo vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1078: RV_7,063.03a vibhrājamāna uṣasām upasthād rebhair ud ety anumadyamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1079: RV_7,063.03c eṣa me devaḥ savitā cacchanda yaḥ samānaṃ na pramināti dhāma
GV01rv_hn07u:1080: RV_7,063.04a divo rukma urucakṣā ud eti dūrearthas taraṇir bhrājamānaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1081: RV_7,063.04c nūnaṃ janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtā ayann arthāni kṛṇavann apāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1082: RV_7,063.05a yatrā cakrur amṛtā gātum asmai śyeno na dīyann anv eti pāthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1083: RV_7,063.05c prati vāṃ sūra udite vidhema namobhir mitrāvaruṇota havyaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1084: RV_7,063.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1085: RV_7,063.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1086: RV_7,064.01a divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyām pra vāṃ ghṛtasya nirṇijo dadīran |
GV01rv_hn07u:1087: RV_7,064.01c havyaṃ no mitro aryamā sujāto rājā sukṣatro varuṇo juṣanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1088: RV_7,064.02a ā rājānā maha ṛtasya gopā sindhupatī kṣatriyā yātam arvāk |
GV01rv_hn07u:1089: RV_7,064.02c iḷāṃ no mitrāvaruṇota vṛṣṭim ava diva invataṃ jīradānū ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1090: RV_7,064.03a mitras tan no varuṇo devo aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhir
GV01rv_hn07u:1092: RV_7,064.03c bravad yathā na ād ariḥ sudāsa iṣā madema saha devagopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1093: RV_7,064.04a yo vāṃ gartam manasā takṣad etam ūrdhvāṃ dhītiṃ kṛṇavad
GV01rv_hn07u:1095: RV_7,064.04c ukṣethām mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tā rājānā sukṣitīs tarpayethām
GV01rv_hn07u:1096: RV_7,064.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1097: RV_7,064.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1098: RV_7,065.01a prati vāṃ sūra udite sūktair mitraṃ huve varuṇam pūtadakṣam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1099: RV_7,065.01c yayor asuryam akṣitaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ viśvasya yāmann ācitā jigatnu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1100: RV_7,065.02a tā hi devānām asurā tāv aryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatam ūrjayantīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1101: RV_7,065.02c aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayaṃ vāṃ dyāvā ca yatra pīpayann ahā ca
GV01rv_hn07u:1102: RV_7,065.03a tā bhūripāśāv anṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1103: RV_7,065.03c ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vām apo na nāvā duritā tarema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1104: RV_7,065.04a ā no mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam iḷābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1105: RV_7,065.04c prati vām atra varam ā janāya pṛṇītam udno divyasya cāroḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1106: RV_7,065.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1107: RV_7,065.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1108: RV_7,066.01a pra mitrayor varuṇayo stomo na etu śūṣyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1110: RV_7,066.02a yā dhārayanta devāḥ sudakṣā dakṣapitarā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1112: RV_7,066.03a tā na stipā tanūpā varuṇa jaritṝṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1114: RV_7,066.04a yad adya sūra udite 'nāgā mitro aryamā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1116: RV_7,066.05a suprāvīr astu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1118: RV_7,066.06a uta svarājo aditir adabdhasya vratasya ye |
GV01rv_hn07u:1120: RV_7,066.07a prati vāṃ sūra udite mitraṃ gṛṇīṣe varuṇam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1122: RV_7,066.08a rāyā hiraṇyayā matir iyam avṛkāya śavase |
GV01rv_hn07u:1124: RV_7,066.09a te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha |
GV01rv_hn07u:1127: RV_7,066.10c trīṇi ye yemur vidathāni dhītibhir viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1128: RV_7,066.11a vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam ād ahar yajñam aktuṃ cād ṛcam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1129: RV_7,066.11c anāpyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā kṣatraṃ rājāna āśata ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1130: RV_7,066.12a tad vo adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūra udite |
GV01rv_hn07u:1131: RV_7,066.12c yad ohate varuṇo mitro aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1132: RV_7,066.13a ṛtāvāna ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdho ghorāso anṛtadviṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1133: RV_7,066.13c teṣāṃ vaḥ sumne succhardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1134: RV_7,066.14a ud u tyad darśataṃ vapur diva eti pratihvare |
GV01rv_hn07u:1135: RV_7,066.14c yad īm āśur vahati deva etaśo viśvasmai cakṣase aram ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1136: RV_7,066.15a śīrṣṇaḥ-śīrṣṇo jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1137: RV_7,066.15c sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryaṃ vahanti harito rathe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1138: RV_7,066.16a tac cakṣur devahitaṃ śukram uccarat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1139: RV_7,066.16b paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1140: RV_7,066.17a kāvyebhir adābhyā yātaṃ varuṇa dyumat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1142: RV_7,066.18a divo dhāmabhir varuṇa mitraś cā yātam adruhā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1144: RV_7,066.19a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇāv āhutiṃ narā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1146: RV_7,067.01a prati vāṃ rathaṃ nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena |
GV01rv_hn07u:1147: RV_7,067.01c yo vāṃ dūto na dhiṣṇyāv ajīgar acchā sūnur na pitarā vivakmi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1148: RV_7,067.02a aśocy agniḥ samidhāno asme upo adṛśran tamasaś cid antāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1149: RV_7,067.02c aceti ketur uṣasaḥ purastāc chriye divo duhitur jāyamānaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1150: RV_7,067.03a abhi vāṃ nūnam aśvinā suhotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyā vivakvān
GV01rv_hn07u:1151: RV_7,067.03c pūrvībhir yātam pathyābhir arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1152: RV_7,067.04a avor vāṃ nūnam aśvinā yuvākur huve yad vāṃ sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1153: RV_7,067.04c ā vāṃ vahantu sthavirāso aśvāḥ pibātho asme suṣutā madhūni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1154: RV_7,067.05a prācīm u devāśvinā dhiyam me 'mṛdhrāṃ sātaye kṛtaṃ vasūyum |
GV01rv_hn07u:1155: RV_7,067.05c viśvā aviṣṭaṃ vāja ā purandhīs tā naḥ śaktaṃ śacīpatī
GV01rv_hn07u:1157: RV_7,067.06a aviṣṭaṃ dhīṣv aśvinā na āsu prajāvad reto ahrayaṃ no astu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1158: RV_7,067.06c ā vāṃ toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1159: RV_7,067.07a eṣa sya vām pūrvagatveva sakhye nidhir hito mādhvī rāto asme
GV01rv_hn07u:1160: RV_7,067.07c aheḷatā manasā yātam arvāg aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1161: RV_7,067.08a ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vāṃ sapta sravato ratho gāt
GV01rv_hn07u:1162: RV_7,067.08c na vāyanti subhvo devayuktā ye vāṃ dhūrṣu taraṇayo vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1163: RV_7,067.09a asaścatā maghavadbhyo hi bhūtaṃ ye rāyā maghadeyaṃ junanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1164: RV_7,067.09c pra ye bandhuṃ sūnṛtābhis tirante gavyā pṛñcanto aśvyā maghāni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1165: RV_7,067.10a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1166: RV_7,067.10c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1168: RV_7,068.01a ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā svaśvā giro dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1169: RV_7,068.01c havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1170: RV_7,068.02a pra vām andhāṃsi madyāny asthur araṃ gantaṃ haviṣo vītaye me
GV01rv_hn07u:1171: RV_7,068.02c tiro aryo havanāni śrutaṃ naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1172: RV_7,068.03a pra vāṃ ratho manojavā iyarti tiro rajāṃsy aśvinā śatotiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1174: RV_7,068.04a ayaṃ ha yad vāṃ devayā u adrir ūrdhvo vivakti somasud yuvabhyām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1175: RV_7,068.04c ā valgū vipro vavṛtīta havyaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1176: RV_7,068.05a citraṃ ha yad vām bhojanaṃ nv asti ny atraye mahiṣvantaṃ yuyotam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1177: RV_7,068.05c yo vām omānaṃ dadhate priyaḥ san ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1178: RV_7,068.06a uta tyad vāṃ jurate aśvinā bhūc cyavānāya pratītyaṃ havirde |
GV01rv_hn07u:1179: RV_7,068.06c adhi yad varpa itaūti dhatthaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1180: RV_7,068.07a uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyo madhye jahur durevāsaḥ samudre |
GV01rv_hn07u:1181: RV_7,068.07c nir īm parṣad arāvā yo yuvākuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1182: RV_7,068.08a vṛkāya cij jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutaṃ śayave hūyamānā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1183: RV_7,068.08c yāv aghnyām apinvatam apo na staryaṃ cic chakty aśvinā
GV01rv_hn07u:1185: RV_7,068.09a eṣa sya kārur jarate sūktair agre budhāna uṣasāṃ sumanmā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1186: RV_7,068.09c iṣā taṃ vardhad aghnyā payobhir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1188: RV_7,069.01a ā vāṃ ratho rodasī badbadhāno hiraṇyayo vṛṣabhir yātv aśvaiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1189: RV_7,069.01c ghṛtavartaniḥ pavibhī rucāna iṣāṃ voḷhā nṛpatir vājinīvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1190: RV_7,069.02a sa paprathāno abhi pañca bhūmā trivandhuro manasā yātu yuktaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1191: RV_7,069.02c viśo yena gacchatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmam aśvinā dadhānā
GV01rv_hn07u:1192: RV_7,069.03a svaśvā yaśasā yātam arvāg dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1193: RV_7,069.03c vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām
GV01rv_hn07u:1194: RV_7,069.04a yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1195: RV_7,069.04c yad devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vāṃ vayo
GV01rv_hn07u:1197: RV_7,069.05a yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1198: RV_7,069.05c tena naḥ śaṃ yor uṣaso vyuṣṭau ny aśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1199: RV_7,069.06a narā gaureva vidyutaṃ tṛṣāṇāsmākam adya savanopa yātam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1200: RV_7,069.06c purutrā hi vām matibhir havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1201: RV_7,069.07a yuvam bhujyum avaviddhaṃ samudra ud ūhathur arṇaso asridhānaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1202: RV_7,069.07c patatribhir aśramair avyathibhir daṃsanābhir aśvinā pārayantā
GV01rv_hn07u:1203: RV_7,069.08a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1204: RV_7,069.08c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1206: RV_7,070.01a ā viśvavārāśvinā gataṃ naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām
GV01rv_hn07u:1208: RV_7,070.01c aśvo na vājī śunapṛṣṭho asthād ā yat sedathur dhruvase na yonim ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1209: RV_7,070.02a siṣakti sā vāṃ sumatiś caniṣṭhātāpi gharmo manuṣo duroṇe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1210: RV_7,070.02c yo vāṃ samudrān saritaḥ piparty etagvā cin na suyujā yujānaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1211: RV_7,070.03a yāni sthānāny aśvinā dadhāthe divo yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1212: RV_7,070.03c ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadanteṣaṃ janāya dāśuṣe vahantā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1213: RV_7,070.04a caniṣṭaṃ devā oṣadhīṣv apsu yad yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1214: RV_7,070.04c purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ny asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathur yugāni
GV01rv_hn07u:1215: RV_7,070.05a śuśruvāṃsā cid aśvinā purūṇy abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1216: RV_7,070.05c prati pra yātaṃ varam ā janāyāsme vām astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā
GV01rv_hn07u:1217: RV_7,070.06a yo vāṃ yajño nāsatyā haviṣmān kṛtabrahmā samaryo bhavāti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1218: RV_7,070.06c upa pra yātaṃ varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇy ṛcyante
GV01rv_hn07u:1220: RV_7,070.07a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1221: RV_7,070.07c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1222: RV_7,071.01a apa svasur uṣaso nag jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīr aruṣāya panthām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1223: RV_7,071.01c aśvāmaghā gomaghā vāṃ huvema divā naktaṃ śarum asmad yuyotam
GV01rv_hn07u:1224: RV_7,071.02a upāyātaṃ dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1225: RV_7,071.02c yuyutam asmad anirām amīvāṃ divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthāṃ naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1226: RV_7,071.03a ā vāṃ ratham avamasyāṃ vyuṣṭau sumnāyavo vṛṣaṇo vartayantu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1227: RV_7,071.03c syūmagabhastim ṛtayugbhir aśvair āśvinā vasumantaṃ vahethām
GV01rv_hn07u:1228: RV_7,071.04a yo vāṃ ratho nṛpatī asti voḷhā trivandhuro vasumāṃ usrayāmā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1229: RV_7,071.04c ā na enā nāsatyopa yātam abhi yad vāṃ viśvapsnyo jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1230: RV_7,071.05a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ jaraso 'mumuktaṃ ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1231: RV_7,071.05c nir aṃhasas tamasa spartam atriṃ ni jāhuṣaṃ śithire dhātam
GV01rv_hn07u:1233: RV_7,071.06a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1234: RV_7,071.06c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1235: RV_7,072.01a ā gomatā nāsatyā rathenāśvāvatā puruścandreṇa yātam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1236: RV_7,072.01c abhi vāṃ viśvā niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā
GV01rv_hn07u:1237: RV_7,072.02a ā no devebhir upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena |
GV01rv_hn07u:1238: RV_7,072.02c yuvor hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samāno bandhur uta tasya vittam
GV01rv_hn07u:1239: RV_7,072.03a ud u stomāso aśvinor abudhrañ jāmi brahmāṇy uṣasaś ca devīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1240: RV_7,072.03c āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyeme acchā vipro nāsatyā vivakti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1241: RV_7,072.04a vi ced ucchanty aśvinā uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravo
GV01rv_hn07u:1243: RV_7,072.04c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred bṛhad agnayaḥ samidhā jarante ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1244: RV_7,072.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:1245: RV_7,072.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1246: RV_7,073.01a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati stomaṃ devayanto dadhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1247: RV_7,073.01c purudaṃsā purutamā purājāmartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1248: RV_7,073.02a ny u priyo manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yo yajate vandate ca |
GV01rv_hn07u:1249: RV_7,073.02c aśnītam madhvo aśvinā upāka ā vāṃ voce vidatheṣu prayasvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1250: RV_7,073.03a ahema yajñam pathām urāṇā imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1251: RV_7,073.03c śruṣṭīveva preṣito vām abodhi prati stomair jaramāṇo vasiṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1252: RV_7,073.04a upa tyā vahnī gamato viśaṃ no rakṣohaṇā sambhṛtā vīḷupāṇī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1253: RV_7,073.04c sam andhāṃsy agmata matsarāṇi mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gataṃ śivena
GV01rv_hn07u:1254: RV_7,073.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:1255: RV_7,073.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1256: RV_7,074.01a imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1257: RV_7,074.01c ayaṃ vām ahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃ-viśaṃ hi gacchathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1258: RV_7,074.02a yuvaṃ citraṃ dadathur bhojanaṃ narā codethāṃ sūnṛtāvate |
GV01rv_hn07u:1259: RV_7,074.02c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1260: RV_7,074.03a ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1261: RV_7,074.03c dugdham payo vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1262: RV_7,074.04a aśvāso ye vām upa dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ yuvāṃ dīyanti bibhrataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1263: RV_7,074.04c makṣūyubhir narā hayebhir aśvinā devā yātam asmayū ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1264: RV_7,074.05a adhā ha yanto aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1265: RV_7,074.05c tā yaṃsato maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ yaśaś chardir asmabhyaṃ nāsatyā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1266: RV_7,074.06a pra ye yayur avṛkāso rathā iva nṛpātāro janānām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1267: RV_7,074.06c uta svena śavasā śūśuvur nara uta kṣiyanti sukṣitim ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1268: RV_7,075.01a vy uṣā āvo divijā ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:1269: RV_7,075.01c apa druhas tama āvar ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyā ajīgaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1270: RV_7,075.02a mahe no adya suvitāya bodhy uṣo mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1271: RV_7,075.02c citraṃ rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehy asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum
GV01rv_hn07u:1272: RV_7,075.03a ete tye bhānavo darśatāyāś citrā uṣaso amṛtāsa āguḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1273: RV_7,075.03c janayanto daivyāni vratāny āpṛṇanto antarikṣā vy asthuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1274: RV_7,075.04a eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyo jigāti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1275: RV_7,075.04c abhipaśyantī vayunā janānāṃ divo duhitā bhuvanasya patnī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1276: RV_7,075.05a vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāya īśe vasūnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1277: RV_7,075.05c ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghony uṣā ucchati vahnibhir gṛṇānā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1278: RV_7,075.06a prati dyutānām aruṣāso aśvāś citrā adṛśrann uṣasaṃ vahantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1279: RV_7,075.06c yāti śubhrā viśvapiśā rathena dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate janāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1280: RV_7,075.07a satyā satyebhir mahatī mahadbhir devī devebhir yajatā yajatraiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1281: RV_7,075.07c rujad dṛḷhāni dadad usriyāṇām prati gāva uṣasaṃ vāvaśanta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1282: RV_7,075.08a nū no gomad vīravad dhehi ratnam uṣo aśvāvat purubhojo asme |
GV01rv_hn07u:1283: RV_7,075.08c mā no barhiḥ puruṣatā nide kar yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1284: RV_7,076.01a ud u jyotir amṛtaṃ viśvajanyaṃ viśvānaraḥ savitā devo aśret |
GV01rv_hn07u:1285: RV_7,076.01c kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣur āvir akar bhuvanaṃ viśvam uṣāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1286: RV_7,076.02a pra me panthā devayānā adṛśrann amardhanto vasubhir iṣkṛtāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1287: RV_7,076.02c abhūd u ketur uṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcy āgād adhi harmyebhyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1288: RV_7,076.03a tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1289: RV_7,076.03c yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty uṣo dadṛkṣe na punar yatīva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1290: RV_7,076.04a ta id devānāṃ sadhamāda āsann ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1291: RV_7,076.04c gūḷhaṃ jyotiḥ pitaro anv avindan satyamantrā ajanayann uṣāsam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1292: RV_7,076.05a samāna ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ saṃ jānate na yatante mithas te |
GV01rv_hn07u:1293: RV_7,076.05c te devānāṃ na minanti vratāny amardhanto vasubhir yādamānāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1294: RV_7,076.06a prati tvā stomair īḷate vasiṣṭhā uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1295: RV_7,076.06c gavāṃ netrī vājapatnī na ucchoṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1296: RV_7,076.07a eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānām uṣā ucchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1297: RV_7,076.07c dīrghaśrutaṃ rayim asme dadhānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1298: RV_7,077.01a upo ruruce yuvatir na yoṣā viśvaṃ jīvam prasuvantī carāyai |
GV01rv_hn07u:1299: RV_7,077.01c abhūd agniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇām akar jyotir bādhamānā tamāṃsi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1300: RV_7,077.02a viśvam pratīcī saprathā ud asthād ruśad vāso bibhratī śukram
GV01rv_hn07u:1302: RV_7,077.02c hiraṇyavarṇā sudṛśīkasaṃdṛg gavām mātā netry ahnām aroci ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1303: RV_7,077.03a devānāṃ cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetaṃ nayantī sudṛśīkam aśvam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1304: RV_7,077.03c uṣā adarśi raśmibhir vyaktā citrāmaghā viśvam anu prabhūtā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1305: RV_7,077.04a antivāmā dūre amitram ucchorvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ kṛdhī naḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1306: RV_7,077.04c yāvaya dveṣa ā bharā vasūni codaya rādho gṛṇate maghoni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1307: RV_7,077.05a asme śreṣṭhebhir bhānubhir vi bhāhy uṣo devi pratirantī na
GV01rv_hn07u:1309: RV_7,077.05c iṣaṃ ca no dadhatī viśvavāre gomad aśvāvad rathavac ca rādhaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1310: RV_7,077.06a yāṃ tvā divo duhitar vardhayanty uṣaḥ sujāte matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1311: RV_7,077.06c sāsmāsu dhā rayim ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1313: RV_7,078.01a prati ketavaḥ prathamā adṛśrann ūrdhvā asyā añjayo vi śrayante |
GV01rv_hn07u:1314: RV_7,078.01c uṣo arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmam asmabhyaṃ vakṣi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1315: RV_7,078.02a prati ṣīm agnir jarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāso matibhir gṛṇantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1316: RV_7,078.02c uṣā yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritāpa devī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1317: RV_7,078.03a etā u tyāḥ praty adṛśran purastāj jyotir yacchantīr uṣaso
GV01rv_hn07u:1319: RV_7,078.03c ajījanan sūryaṃ yajñam agnim apācīnaṃ tamo agād ajuṣṭam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1320: RV_7,078.04a aceti divo duhitā maghonī viśve paśyanty uṣasaṃ vibhātīm |
GV01rv_hn07u:1321: RV_7,078.04c āsthād rathaṃ svadhayā yujyamānam ā yam aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1322: RV_7,078.05a prati tvādya sumanaso budhantāsmākāso maghavāno vayaṃ ca |
GV01rv_hn07u:1323: RV_7,078.05c tilvilāyadhvam uṣaso vibhātīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1324: RV_7,079.01a vy uṣā āvaḥ pathyā janānām pañca kṣitīr mānuṣīr bodhayantī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1325: RV_7,079.01c susaṃdṛgbhir ukṣabhir bhānum aśred vi sūryo rodasī cakṣasāvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1326: RV_7,079.02a vy añjate divo anteṣv aktūn viśo na yuktā uṣaso yatante |
GV01rv_hn07u:1327: RV_7,079.02c saṃ te gāvas tama ā vartayanti jyotir yacchanti saviteva bāhū
GV01rv_hn07u:1328: RV_7,079.03a abhūd uṣā indratamā maghony ajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1329: RV_7,079.03c vi divo devī duhitā dadhāty aṅgirastamā sukṛte vasūni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1330: RV_7,079.04a tāvad uṣo rādho asmabhyaṃ rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyo arado gṛṇānā
GV01rv_hn07u:1331: RV_7,079.04c yāṃ tvā jajñur vṛṣabhasyā raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duro adrer
GV01rv_hn07u:1333: RV_7,079.05a devaṃ-devaṃ rādhase codayanty asmadryak sūnṛtā īrayantī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1334: RV_7,079.05c vyucchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1336: RV_7,080.01a prati stomebhir uṣasaṃ vasiṣṭhā gīrbhir viprāsaḥ prathamā abudhran |
GV01rv_hn07u:1337: RV_7,080.01c vivartayantīṃ rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīm bhuvanāni viśvā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1338: RV_7,080.02a eṣā syā navyam āyur dadhānā gūḍhvī tamo jyotiṣoṣā abodhi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1339: RV_7,080.02c agra eti yuvatir ahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryaṃ yajñam agnim ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1340: RV_7,080.03a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1341: RV_7,080.03c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1342: RV_7,081.01a praty u adarśy āyaty ucchantī duhitā divaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1343: RV_7,081.01c apo mahi vyayati cakṣase tamo jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1344: RV_7,081.02a ud usriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacāṃ udyan nakṣatram arcivat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1345: RV_7,081.02c taved uṣo vyuṣi sūryasya ca sam bhaktena gamemahi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1346: RV_7,081.03a prati tvā duhitar diva uṣo jīrā abhutsmahi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1347: RV_7,081.03c yā vahasi puru spārhaṃ vananvati ratnaṃ na dāśuṣe mayaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1348: RV_7,081.04a ucchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi prakhyai devi svar dṛśe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1349: RV_7,081.04c tasyās te ratnabhāja īmahe vayaṃ syāma mātur na sūnavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1350: RV_7,081.05a tac citraṃ rādha ā bharoṣo yad dīrghaśruttamam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1351: RV_7,081.05c yat te divo duhitar martabhojanaṃ tad rāsva bhunajāmahai ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1352: RV_7,081.06a śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanaṃ vājāṃ asmabhyaṃ gomataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1353: RV_7,081.06c codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvaty uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1354: RV_7,082.01a indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya no viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1355: RV_7,082.01c dīrghaprayajyum ati yo vanuṣyati vayaṃ jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1356: RV_7,082.02a samrāḷ anyaḥ svarāḷ anya ucyate vām mahāntāv indrāvaruṇā mahāvasū |
GV01rv_hn07u:1357: RV_7,082.02c viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani saṃ vām ojo vṛṣaṇā sam balaṃ dadhuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1358: RV_7,082.03a anv apāṃ khāny atṛntam ojasā sūryam airayataṃ divi prabhum |
GV01rv_hn07u:1359: RV_7,082.03c indrāvaruṇā made asya māyino 'pinvatam apitaḥ pinvataṃ dhiyaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1360: RV_7,082.04a yuvām id yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayo yuvāṃ kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1361: RV_7,082.04c īśānā vasva ubhayasya kārava indrāvaruṇā suhavā havāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1362: RV_7,082.05a indrāvaruṇā yad imāni cakrathur viśvā jātāni bhuvanasya majmanā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1363: RV_7,082.05c kṣemeṇa mitro varuṇaṃ duvasyati marudbhir ugraḥ śubham anya īyate ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1364: RV_7,082.06a mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣa ojo mimāte dhruvam asya yat svam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1365: RV_7,082.06c ajāmim anyaḥ śnathayantam ātirad dabhrebhir anyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1366: RV_7,082.07a na tam aṃho na duritāni martyam indrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutaś cana |
GV01rv_hn07u:1367: RV_7,082.07c yasya devā gacchatho vītho adhvaraṃ na tam martasya naśate
GV01rv_hn07u:1369: RV_7,082.08a arvāṅ narā daivyenāvasā gataṃ śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yadi me jujoṣathaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1370: RV_7,082.08c yuvor hi sakhyam uta vā yad āpyam mārḍīkam indrāvaruṇā ni yacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1371: RV_7,082.09a asmākam indrāvaruṇā bhare-bhare puroyodhā bhavataṃ kṛṣṭyojasā
GV01rv_hn07u:1372: RV_7,082.09c yad vāṃ havanta ubhaye adha spṛdhi naras tokasya tanayasya
GV01rv_hn07u:1374: RV_7,082.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma
GV01rv_hn07u:1376: RV_7,082.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1377: RV_7,083.01a yuvāṃ narā paśyamānāsa āpyam prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthuparśavo yayuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1378: RV_7,083.01c dāsā ca vṛtrā hatam āryāṇi ca sudāsam indrāvaruṇāvasāvatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1379: RV_7,083.02a yatrā naraḥ samayante kṛtadhvajo yasminn ājā bhavati kiṃ cana
GV01rv_hn07u:1381: RV_7,083.02c yatrā bhayante bhuvanā svardṛśas tatrā na indrāvaruṇādhi vocatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1382: RV_7,083.03a sam bhūmyā antā dhvasirā adṛkṣatendrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣa āruhat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1383: RV_7,083.03c asthur janānām upa mām arātayo 'rvāg avasā havanaśrutā gatam
GV01rv_hn07u:1384: RV_7,083.04a indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhir aprati bhedaṃ vanvantā pra sudāsam āvatam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1385: RV_7,083.04c brahmāṇy eṣāṃ śṛṇutaṃ havīmani satyā tṛtsūnām abhavat purohitiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1386: RV_7,083.05a indrāvaruṇāv abhy ā tapanti māghāny aryo vanuṣām arātayaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1387: RV_7,083.05c yuvaṃ hi vasva ubhayasya rājatho 'dha smā no 'vatam pārye divi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1388: RV_7,083.06a yuvāṃ havanta ubhayāsa ājiṣv indraṃ ca vasvo varuṇaṃ ca
GV01rv_hn07u:1390: RV_7,083.06c yatra rājabhir daśabhir nibādhitam pra sudāsam āvataṃ tṛtsubhiḥ saha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1391: RV_7,083.07a daśa rājānaḥ samitā ayajyavaḥ sudāsam indrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1392: RV_7,083.07c satyā nṛṇām admasadām upastutir devā eṣām abhavan devahūtiṣu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1393: RV_7,083.08a dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvataḥ sudāsa indrāvaruṇāv aśikṣatam
GV01rv_hn07u:1394: RV_7,083.08c śvityañco yatra namasā kapardino dhiyā dhīvanto asapanta tṛtsavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1395: RV_7,083.09a vṛtrāṇy anyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratāny anyo abhi rakṣate sadā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1396: RV_7,083.09c havāmahe vāṃ vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhir asme indrāvaruṇā śarma yacchatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1397: RV_7,083.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma
GV01rv_hn07u:1399: RV_7,083.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1400: RV_7,084.01a ā vāṃ rājānāv adhvare vavṛtyāṃ havyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1401: RV_7,084.01c pra vāṃ ghṛtācī bāhvor dadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1402: RV_7,084.02a yuvo rāṣṭram bṛhad invati dyaur yau setṛbhir arajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1403: RV_7,084.02c pari no heḷo varuṇasya vṛjyā uruṃ na indraḥ kṛṇavad u lokam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1404: RV_7,084.03a kṛtaṃ no yajñaṃ vidatheṣu cāruṃ kṛtam brahmāṇi sūriṣu praśastā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1405: RV_7,084.03c upo rayir devajūto na etu pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tiretam
GV01rv_hn07u:1406: RV_7,084.04a asme indrāvaruṇā viśvavāraṃ rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantam purukṣum
GV01rv_hn07u:1407: RV_7,084.04c pra ya ādityo anṛtā mināty amitā śūro dayate vasūni ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1408: RV_7,084.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1409: RV_7,084.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1410: RV_7,085.01a punīṣe vām arakṣasam manīṣāṃ somam indrāya varuṇāya juhvat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1411: RV_7,085.01c ghṛtapratīkām uṣasaṃ na devīṃ tā no yāmann uruṣyatām abhīke
GV01rv_hn07u:1412: RV_7,085.02a spardhante vā u devahūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti
GV01rv_hn07u:1413: RV_7,085.02c yuvaṃ tāṃ indrāvaruṇāv amitrān hatam parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1414: RV_7,085.03a āpaś cid dhi svayaśasaḥ sadassu devīr indraṃ varuṇaṃ devatā
GV01rv_hn07u:1416: RV_7,085.03c kṛṣṭīr anyo dhārayati praviktā vṛtrāṇy anyo apratīni hanti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1417: RV_7,085.04a sa sukratur ṛtacid astu hotā ya āditya śavasā vāṃ namasvān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1418: RV_7,085.04c āvavartad avase vāṃ haviṣmān asad it sa suvitāya prayasvān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1419: RV_7,085.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1420: RV_7,085.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1421: RV_7,086.01a dhīrā tv asya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yas tastambha rodasī cid urvī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1422: RV_7,086.01c pra nākam ṛṣvaṃ nunude bṛhantaṃ dvitā nakṣatram paprathac ca
GV01rv_hn07u:1424: RV_7,086.02a uta svayā tanvā saṃ vade tat kadā nv antar varuṇe bhuvāni |
GV01rv_hn07u:1425: RV_7,086.02c kim me havyam ahṛṇāno juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkaṃ sumanā abhi khyam
GV01rv_hn07u:1426: RV_7,086.03a pṛcche tad eno varuṇa didṛkṣūpo emi cikituṣo vipṛccham |
GV01rv_hn07u:1427: RV_7,086.03c samānam in me kavayaś cid āhur ayaṃ ha tubhyaṃ varuṇo hṛṇīte ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1428: RV_7,086.04a kim āga āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ yat stotāraṃ jighāṃsasi sakhāyam
GV01rv_hn07u:1429: RV_7,086.04c pra tan me voco dūḷabha svadhāvo 'va tvānenā namasā tura iyām
GV01rv_hn07u:1430: RV_7,086.05a ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛjā no 'va yā vayaṃ cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1431: RV_7,086.05c ava rājan paśutṛpaṃ na tāyuṃ sṛjā vatsaṃ na dāmno vasiṣṭham
GV01rv_hn07u:1432: RV_7,086.06a na sa svo dakṣo varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyur vibhīdako acittiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1433: RV_7,086.06c asti jyāyān kanīyasa upāre svapnaś caned anṛtasya prayotā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1434: RV_7,086.07a araṃ dāso na mīḷhuṣe karāṇy ahaṃ devāya bhūrṇaye 'nāgāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1435: RV_7,086.07c acetayad acito devo aryo gṛtsaṃ rāye kavitaro junāti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1436: RV_7,086.08a ayaṃ su tubhyaṃ varuṇa svadhāvo hṛdi stoma upaśritaś cid astu
GV01rv_hn07u:1437: RV_7,086.08c śaṃ naḥ kṣeme śam u yoge no astu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1439: RV_7,087.01a radat patho varuṇaḥ sūryāya prārṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1440: RV_7,087.01c sargo na sṛṣṭo arvatīr ṛtāyañ cakāra mahīr avanīr ahabhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1441: RV_7,087.02a ātmā te vāto raja ā navīnot paśur na bhūrṇir yavase sasavān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1442: RV_7,087.02c antar mahī bṛhatī rodasīme viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1443: RV_7,087.03a pari spaśo varuṇasya smadiṣṭā ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke |
GV01rv_hn07u:1444: RV_7,087.03c ṛtāvānaḥ kavayo yajñadhīrāḥ pracetaso ya iṣayanta manma ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1445: RV_7,087.04a uvāca me varuṇo medhirāya triḥ sapta nāmāghnyā bibharti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1446: RV_7,087.04c vidvān padasya guhyā na vocad yugāya vipra uparāya śikṣan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1447: RV_7,087.05a tisro dyāvo nihitā antar asmin tisro bhūmīr uparāḥ ṣaḍvidhānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1448: RV_7,087.05c gṛtso rājā varuṇaś cakra etaṃ divi preṅkhaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śubhe
GV01rv_hn07u:1450: RV_7,087.06a ava sindhuṃ varuṇo dyaur iva sthād drapso na śveto mṛgas tuviṣmān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1451: RV_7,087.06c gambhīraśaṃso rajaso vimānaḥ supārakṣatraḥ sato asya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1452: RV_7,087.07a yo mṛḷayāti cakruṣe cid āgo vayaṃ syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1453: RV_7,087.07c anu vratāny aditer ṛdhanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1454: RV_7,088.01a pra śundhyuvaṃ varuṇāya preṣṭhām matiṃ vasiṣṭha mīḷhuṣe bharasva |
GV01rv_hn07u:1455: RV_7,088.01c ya īm arvāñcaṃ karate yajatraṃ sahasrāmaghaṃ vṛṣaṇam bṛhantam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1456: RV_7,088.02a adhā nv asya saṃdṛśaṃ jaganvān agner anīkaṃ varuṇasya maṃsi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1457: RV_7,088.02c svar yad aśmann adhipā u andho 'bhi mā vapur dṛśaye ninīyāt
GV01rv_hn07u:1458: RV_7,088.03a ā yad ruhāva varuṇaś ca nāvam pra yat samudram īrayāva madhyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1459: RV_7,088.03c adhi yad apāṃ snubhiś carāva pra preṅkha īṅkhayāvahai śubhe
GV01rv_hn07u:1461: RV_7,088.04a vasiṣṭhaṃ ha varuṇo nāvy ādhād ṛṣiṃ cakāra svapā mahobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1462: RV_7,088.04c stotāraṃ vipraḥ sudinatve ahnāṃ yān nu dyāvas tatanan yād
GV01rv_hn07u:1464: RV_7,088.05a kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yad avṛkam purā cit |
GV01rv_hn07u:1465: RV_7,088.05c bṛhantam mānaṃ varuṇa svadhāvaḥ sahasradvāraṃ jagamā gṛhaṃ te ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1466: RV_7,088.06a ya āpir nityo varuṇa priyaḥ san tvām āgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te |
GV01rv_hn07u:1467: RV_7,088.06c mā ta enasvanto yakṣin bhujema yandhi ṣmā vipra stuvate
GV01rv_hn07u:1469: RV_7,088.07a dhruvāsu tvāsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyanto vy asmat pāśaṃ varuṇo mumocat
GV01rv_hn07u:1470: RV_7,088.07c avo vanvānā aditer upasthād yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1471: RV_7,089.01a mo ṣu varuṇa mṛnmayaṃ gṛhaṃ rājann ahaṃ gamam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1473: RV_7,089.02a yad emi prasphurann iva dṛtir na dhmāto adrivaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1475: RV_7,089.03a kratvaḥ samaha dīnatā pratīpaṃ jagamā śuce |
GV01rv_hn07u:1477: RV_7,089.04a apām madhye tasthivāṃsaṃ tṛṣṇāvidaj jaritāram |
GV01rv_hn07u:1479: RV_7,089.05a yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidroham manuṣyāś carāmasi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1480: RV_7,089.05c acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1481: RV_7,090.01a pra vīrayā śucayo dadrire vām adhvaryubhir madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1482: RV_7,090.01c vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy acchā pibā sutasyāndhaso madāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1483: RV_7,090.02a īśānāya prahutiṃ yas ta ānaṭ chuciṃ somaṃ śucipās tubhyaṃ
GV01rv_hn07u:1485: RV_7,090.02c kṛṇoṣi tam martyeṣu praśastaṃ jāto-jāto jāyate vājy asya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1486: RV_7,090.03a rāye nu yaṃ jajñatū rodasīme rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1487: RV_7,090.03c adha vāyuṃ niyutaḥ saścata svā uta śvetaṃ vasudhitiṃ nireke
GV01rv_hn07u:1488: RV_7,090.04a ucchann uṣasaḥ sudinā ariprā uru jyotir vividur dīdhyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1489: RV_7,090.04c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam uśijo vi vavrus teṣām anu pradivaḥ sasrur āpaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1490: RV_7,090.05a te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1491: RV_7,090.05c indravāyū vīravāhaṃ rathaṃ vām īśānayor abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1492: RV_7,090.06a īśānāso ye dadhate svar ṇo gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir hiraṇyaiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1493: RV_7,090.06c indravāyū sūrayo viśvam āyur arvadbhir vīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1494: RV_7,090.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1495: RV_7,090.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1496: RV_7,091.01a kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan |
GV01rv_hn07u:1497: RV_7,091.01c te vāyave manave bādhitāyāvāsayann uṣasaṃ sūryeṇa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1498: RV_7,091.02a uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaś ca pāthaḥ śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1499: RV_7,091.02c indravāyū suṣṭutir vām iyānā mārḍīkam īṭṭe suvitaṃ ca navyam
GV01rv_hn07u:1500: RV_7,091.03a pīvoannāṃ rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1501: RV_7,091.03c te vāyave samanaso vi tasthur viśven naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1502: RV_7,091.04a yāvat taras tanvo yāvad ojo yāvan naraś cakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1503: RV_7,091.04c śuciṃ somaṃ śucipā pātam asme indravāyū sadatam barhir edam
GV01rv_hn07u:1504: RV_7,091.05a niyuvānā niyuta spārhavīrā indravāyū sarathaṃ yātam arvāk |
GV01rv_hn07u:1505: RV_7,091.05c idaṃ hi vām prabhṛtam madhvo agram adha prīṇānā vi mumuktam asme ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1506: RV_7,091.06a yā vāṃ śataṃ niyuto yāḥ sahasram indravāyū viśvavārāḥ sacante
GV01rv_hn07u:1507: RV_7,091.06c ābhir yātaṃ suvidatrābhir arvāk pātaṃ narā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1508: RV_7,091.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1509: RV_7,091.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1510: RV_7,092.01a ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā upa naḥ sahasraṃ te niyuto viśvavāra |
GV01rv_hn07u:1511: RV_7,092.01c upo te andho madyam ayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1512: RV_7,092.02a pra sotā jīro adhvareṣv asthāt somam indrāya vāyave pibadhyai
GV01rv_hn07u:1513: RV_7,092.02c pra yad vām madhvo agriyam bharanty adhvaryavo devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1514: RV_7,092.03a pra yābhir yāsi dāśvāṃsam acchā niyudbhir vāyav iṣṭaye duroṇe
GV01rv_hn07u:1515: RV_7,092.03c ni no rayiṃ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyam aśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1516: RV_7,092.04a ye vāyava indramādanāsa ādevāso nitośanāso aryaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1517: RV_7,092.04c ghnanto vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ ṣyāma sāsahvāṃso yudhā nṛbhir amitrān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1518: RV_7,092.05a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi yajñam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1519: RV_7,092.05c vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1520: RV_7,093.01a śuciṃ nu stomaṃ navajātam adyendrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā juṣethām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1521: RV_7,093.01c ubhā hi vāṃ suhavā johavīmi tā vājaṃ sadya uśate dheṣṭhā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1522: RV_7,093.02a tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtaṃ sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1523: RV_7,093.02c kṣayantau rāyo yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktaṃ vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1524: RV_7,093.03a upo ha yad vidathaṃ vājino gur dhībhir viprāḥ pramatim
GV01rv_hn07u:1526: RV_7,093.03c arvanto na kāṣṭhāṃ nakṣamāṇā indrāgnī johuvato naras te ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1527: RV_7,093.04a gīrbhir vipraḥ pramatim icchamāna īṭṭe rayiṃ yaśasam pūrvabhājam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1528: RV_7,093.04c indrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā suvajrā pra no navyebhis tirataṃ deṣṇaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1529: RV_7,093.05a saṃ yan mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite |
GV01rv_hn07u:1530: RV_7,093.05c adevayuṃ vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hataṃ somasutā janena ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1531: RV_7,093.06a imām u ṣu somasutim upa na endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1532: RV_7,093.06c nū cid dhi parimamnāthe asmān ā vāṃ śaśvadbhir vavṛtīya
GV01rv_hn07u:1534: RV_7,093.07a so agna enā namasā samiddho 'cchā mitraṃ varuṇam indraṃ voceḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1535: RV_7,093.07c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷa tad aryamāditiḥ śiśrathantu
GV01rv_hn07u:1536: RV_7,093.08a etā agna āśuṣāṇāsa iṣṭīr yuvoḥ sacābhy aśyāma vājān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1537: RV_7,093.08c mendro no viṣṇur marutaḥ pari khyan yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1539: RV_7,094.01a iyaṃ vām asya manmana indrāgnī pūrvyastutiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1541: RV_7,094.02a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havam indrāgnī vanataṃ giraḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1543: RV_7,094.03a mā pāpatvāya no narendrāgnī mābhiśastaye |
GV01rv_hn07u:1545: RV_7,094.04a indre agnā namo bṛhat suvṛktim erayāmahe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1547: RV_7,094.05a tā hi śaśvanta īḷata itthā viprāsa ūtaye |
GV01rv_hn07u:1549: RV_7,094.06a tā vāṃ gīrbhir vipanyavaḥ prayasvanto havāmahe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1551: RV_7,094.07a indrāgnī avasā gatam asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1553: RV_7,094.08a mā kasya no araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1555: RV_7,094.09a gomad dhiraṇyavad vasu yad vām aśvāvad īmahe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1557: RV_7,094.10a yat soma ā sute nara indrāgnī ajohavuḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1559: RV_7,094.11a ukthebhir vṛtrahantamā yā mandānā cid ā girā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1561: RV_7,094.12a tāv id duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ durvidvāṃsaṃ rakṣasvinam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1562: RV_7,094.12c ābhogaṃ hanmanā hatam udadhiṃ hanmanā hatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1563: RV_7,095.01a pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasra eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇam āyasī pūḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1564: RV_7,095.01c prabābadhānā rathyeva yāti viśvā apo mahinā sindhur anyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1565: RV_7,095.02a ekācetat sarasvatī nadīnāṃ śucir yatī giribhya ā samudrāt |
GV01rv_hn07u:1566: RV_7,095.02c rāyaś cetantī bhuvanasya bhūrer ghṛtam payo duduhe nāhuṣāya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1567: RV_7,095.03a sa vāvṛdhe naryo yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśur vṛṣabho yajñiyāsu |
GV01rv_hn07u:1568: RV_7,095.03c sa vājinam maghavadbhyo dadhāti vi sātaye tanvam māmṛjīta ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1569: RV_7,095.04a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇopa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin |
GV01rv_hn07u:1570: RV_7,095.04c mitajñubhir namasyair iyānā rāyā yujā cid uttarā sakhibhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1571: RV_7,095.05a imā juhvānā yuṣmad ā namobhiḥ prati stomaṃ sarasvati juṣasva
GV01rv_hn07u:1572: RV_7,095.05c tava śarman priyatame dadhānā upa stheyāma śaraṇaṃ na vṛkṣam
GV01rv_hn07u:1573: RV_7,095.06a ayam u te sarasvati vasiṣṭho dvārāv ṛtasya subhage vy āvaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1574: RV_7,095.06c vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1576: RV_7,096.01a bṛhad u gāyiṣe vaco 'suryā nadīnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1577: RV_7,096.01c sarasvatīm in mahayā suvṛktibhi stomair vasiṣṭha rodasī ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1578: RV_7,096.02a ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1579: RV_7,096.02c sā no bodhy avitrī marutsakhā coda rādho maghonām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1580: RV_7,096.03a bhadram id bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvaty akavārī cetati vājinīvatī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1581: RV_7,096.03c gṛṇānā jamadagnivat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭhavat ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1582: RV_7,096.04a janīyanto nv agravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1584: RV_7,096.05a ye te sarasva ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1586: RV_7,096.06a pīpivāṃsaṃ sarasvata stanaṃ yo viśvadarśataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1588: RV_7,097.01a yajñe divo nṛṣadane pṛthivyā naro yatra devayavo madanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1589: RV_7,097.01c indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gaman madāya prathamaṃ vayaś ca
GV01rv_hn07u:1590: RV_7,097.02a ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe 'vāṃsi bṛhaspatir no maha ā sakhāyaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1591: RV_7,097.02c yathā bhavema mīḷhuṣe anāgā yo no dātā parāvataḥ piteva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1592: RV_7,097.03a tam u jyeṣṭhaṃ namasā havirbhiḥ suśevam brahmaṇas patiṃ gṛṇīṣe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1593: RV_7,097.03c indraṃ śloko mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yo brahmaṇo devakṛtasya rājā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1594: RV_7,097.04a sa ā no yoniṃ sadatu preṣṭho bṛhaspatir viśvavāro yo asti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1595: RV_7,097.04c kāmo rāyaḥ suvīryasya taṃ dāt parṣan no ati saścato ariṣṭān
GV01rv_hn07u:1596: RV_7,097.05a tam ā no arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsur amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1597: RV_7,097.05c śucikrandaṃ yajatam pastyānām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇaṃ huvema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1598: RV_7,097.06a taṃ śagmāso aruṣāso aśvā bṛhaspatiṃ sahavāho vahanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1599: RV_7,097.06c sahaś cid yasya nīlavat sadhasthaṃ nabho na rūpam aruṣaṃ
GV01rv_hn07u:1601: RV_7,097.07a sa hi śuciḥ śatapatraḥ sa śundhyur hiraṇyavāśīr iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1602: RV_7,097.07c bṛhaspatiḥ sa svāveśa ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhya āsutiṃ kariṣṭhaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1603: RV_7,097.08a devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatiṃ vāvṛdhatur mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1604: RV_7,097.08c dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karad brahmaṇe sutarā sugādhā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1605: RV_7,097.09a iyaṃ vām brahmaṇas pate suvṛktir brahmendrāya vajriṇe akāri |
GV01rv_hn07u:1606: RV_7,097.09c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1607: RV_7,097.10a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1608: RV_7,097.10c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1610: RV_7,098.01a adhvaryavo 'ruṇaṃ dugdham aṃśuṃ juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1611: RV_7,098.01c gaurād vedīyāṃ avapānam indro viśvāhed yāti sutasomam icchan ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1612: RV_7,098.02a yad dadhiṣe pradivi cārv annaṃ dive-dive pītim id asya vakṣi
GV01rv_hn07u:1613: RV_7,098.02c uta hṛdota manasā juṣāṇa uśann indra prasthitān pāhi somān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1614: RV_7,098.03a jajñānaḥ somaṃ sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca |
GV01rv_hn07u:1615: RV_7,098.03c endra paprāthorv antarikṣaṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha
GV01rv_hn07u:1616: RV_7,098.04a yad yodhayā mahato manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1617: RV_7,098.04c yad vā nṛbhir vṛta indrābhiyudhyās taṃ tvayājiṃ sauśravasaṃ jayema ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1618: RV_7,098.05a prendrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra
GV01rv_hn07u:1619: RV_7,098.05c yaded adevīr asahiṣṭa māyā athābhavat kevalaḥ somo asya ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1620: RV_7,098.06a tavedaṃ viśvam abhitaḥ paśavyaṃ yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1621: RV_7,098.06c gavām asi gopatir eka indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1622: RV_7,098.07a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1623: RV_7,098.07c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1625: RV_7,099.01a paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anv aśnuvanti |
GV01rv_hn07u:1626: RV_7,099.01c ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse
GV01rv_hn07u:1627: RV_7,099.02a na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa |
GV01rv_hn07u:1628: RV_7,099.02c ud astabhnā nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubham pṛthivyāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1629: RV_7,099.03a irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtaṃ sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1630: RV_7,099.03c vy astabhnā rodasī viṣṇav ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhito mayūkhaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1631: RV_7,099.04a uruṃ yajñāya cakrathur u lokaṃ janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim
GV01rv_hn07u:1632: RV_7,099.04c dāsasya cid vṛṣaśiprasya māyā jaghnathur narā pṛtanājyeṣu ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1633: RV_7,099.05a indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puro navatiṃ ca śnathiṣṭam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1634: RV_7,099.05c śataṃ varcinaḥ sahasraṃ ca sākaṃ hatho apraty asurasya vīrān
GV01rv_hn07u:1635: RV_7,099.06a iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantorukramā tavasā vardhayantī |
GV01rv_hn07u:1636: RV_7,099.06c rare vāṃ stomaṃ vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣo vṛjaneṣv indra
GV01rv_hn07u:1637: RV_7,099.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1638: RV_7,099.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1640: RV_7,100.01a nū marto dayate saniṣyan yo viṣṇava urugāyāya dāśat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1641: RV_7,100.01c pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāta etāvantaṃ naryam āvivāsāt ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1642: RV_7,100.02a tvaṃ viṣṇo sumatiṃ viśvajanyām aprayutām evayāvo matiṃ dāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1643: RV_7,100.02c parco yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūrer aśvāvataḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1644: RV_7,100.03a trir devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1645: RV_7,100.03c pra viṣṇur astu tavasas tavīyān tveṣaṃ hy asya sthavirasya
GV01rv_hn07u:1647: RV_7,100.04a vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ kṣetrāya viṣṇur manuṣe daśasyan
GV01rv_hn07u:1648: RV_7,100.04c dhruvāso asya kīrayo janāsa urukṣitiṃ sujanimā cakāra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1649: RV_7,100.05a pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāmāryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān |
GV01rv_hn07u:1650: RV_7,100.05c taṃ tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam atavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke
GV01rv_hn07u:1651: RV_7,100.06a kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yad vavakṣe śipiviṣṭo asmi |
GV01rv_hn07u:1652: RV_7,100.06c mā varpo asmad apa gūha etad yad anyarūpaḥ samithe babhūtha
GV01rv_hn07u:1653: RV_7,100.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1654: RV_7,100.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā
GV01rv_hn07u:1656: RV_7,101.01a tisro vācaḥ pra vada jyotiragrā yā etad duhre madhudogham
GV01rv_hn07u:1658: RV_7,101.01c sa vatsaṃ kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnāṃ sadyo jāto vṛṣabho roravīti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1659: RV_7,101.02a yo vardhana oṣadhīnāṃ yo apāṃ yo viśvasya jagato deva īśe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1660: RV_7,101.02c sa tridhātu śaraṇaṃ śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ svabhiṣṭy asme ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1661: RV_7,101.03a starīr u tvad bhavati sūta u tvad yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1662: RV_7,101.03c pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena
GV01rv_hn07u:1664: RV_7,101.04a yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthus tisro dyāvas tredhā sasrur āpaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1665: RV_7,101.04c trayaḥ kośāsa upasecanāso madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1666: RV_7,101.05a idaṃ vacaḥ parjanyāya svarāje hṛdo astv antaraṃ taj jujoṣat |
GV01rv_hn07u:1667: RV_7,101.05c mayobhuvo vṛṣṭayaḥ santv asme supippalā oṣadhīr devagopāḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1668: RV_7,101.06a sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnāṃ tasminn ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca |
GV01rv_hn07u:1669: RV_7,101.06c tan ma ṛtam pātu śataśāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1670: RV_7,102.01a parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḷhuṣe |
GV01rv_hn07u:1672: RV_7,102.02a yo garbham oṣadhīnāṃ gavāṃ kṛṇoty arvatām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1674: RV_7,102.03a tasmā id āsye havir juhotā madhumattamam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1677: RV_7,103.01c vācam parjanyajinvitām pra maṇḍūkā avādiṣuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1678: RV_7,103.02a divyā āpo abhi yad enam āyan dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1679: RV_7,103.02c gavām aha na māyur vatsinīnām maṇḍūkānāṃ vagnur atrā sam eti
GV01rv_hn07u:1680: RV_7,103.03a yad īm enāṃ uśato abhy avarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣy āgatāyām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1681: RV_7,103.03c akhkhalīkṛtyā pitaraṃ na putro anyo anyam upa vadantam eti ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1682: RV_7,103.04a anyo anyam anu gṛbhṇāty enor apām prasarge yad amandiṣātām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1683: RV_7,103.04c maṇḍūko yad abhivṛṣṭaḥ kaniṣkan pṛśniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1684: RV_7,103.05a yad eṣām anyo anyasya vācaṃ śāktasyeva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1685: RV_7,103.05c sarvaṃ tad eṣāṃ samṛdheva parva yat suvāco vadathanādhy apsu
GV01rv_hn07u:1686: RV_7,103.06a gomāyur eko ajamāyur ekaḥ pṛśnir eko harita eka eṣām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1687: RV_7,103.06c samānaṃ nāma bibhrato virūpāḥ purutrā vācam pipiśur vadantaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1688: RV_7,103.07a brāhmaṇāso atirātre na some saro na pūrṇam abhito vadantaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1689: RV_7,103.07c saṃvatsarasya tad ahaḥ pari ṣṭha yan maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇam babhūva ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1690: RV_7,103.08a brāhmaṇāsaḥ somino vācam akrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ
GV01rv_hn07u:1692: RV_7,103.08c adhvaryavo gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānā āvir bhavanti guhyā na ke cit
GV01rv_hn07u:1693: RV_7,103.09a devahitiṃ jugupur dvādaśasya ṛtuṃ naro na pra minanty ete |
GV01rv_hn07u:1694: RV_7,103.09c saṃvatsare prāvṛṣy āgatāyāṃ taptā gharmā aśnuvate visargam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1695: RV_7,103.10a gomāyur adād ajamāyur adāt pṛśnir adād dharito no vasūni |
GV01rv_hn07u:1696: RV_7,103.10c gavām maṇḍūkā dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1697: RV_7,104.01a indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1698: RV_7,104.01c parā śṛṇītam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam
GV01rv_hn07u:1700: RV_7,104.02a indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnivāṃ iva |
GV01rv_hn07u:1701: RV_7,104.02c brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ
GV01rv_hn07u:1703: RV_7,104.03a indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1704: RV_7,104.03c yathā nātaḥ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1705: RV_7,104.04a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ sam pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1706: RV_7,104.04c ut takṣataṃ svaryam parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1707: RV_7,104.05a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam
GV01rv_hn07u:1709: RV_7,104.05c tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir atriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1710: RV_7,104.06a indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvata iyam matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1711: RV_7,104.06c yāṃ vāṃ hotrām parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1712: RV_7,104.07a prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1713: RV_7,104.07c indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūd yo naḥ kadā cid abhidāsati druhā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1714: RV_7,104.08a yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1715: RV_7,104.08c āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asann astv āsata indra vaktā ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1716: RV_7,104.09a ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1717: RV_7,104.09c ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upasthe ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1718: RV_7,104.10a yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yas tanūnām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1719: RV_7,104.10c ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1720: RV_7,104.11a paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ |
GV01rv_hn07u:1721: RV_7,104.11c prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo no divā dipsati yaś ca naktam
GV01rv_hn07u:1722: RV_7,104.12a suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛdhāte |
GV01rv_hn07u:1723: RV_7,104.12c tayor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty āsat ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1724: RV_7,104.13a na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam
GV01rv_hn07u:1725: RV_7,104.13c hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1726: RV_7,104.14a yadi vāham anṛtadeva āsa moghaṃ vā devāṃ apyūhe agne |
GV01rv_hn07u:1727: RV_7,104.14c kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1728: RV_7,104.15a adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa pūruṣasya |
GV01rv_hn07u:1729: RV_7,104.15c adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety āha ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1730: RV_7,104.16a yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo vā rakṣāḥ śucir asmīty āha |
GV01rv_hn07u:1731: RV_7,104.16c indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1732: RV_7,104.17a pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhā tanvaṃ gūhamānā |
GV01rv_hn07u:1733: RV_7,104.17c vavrāṃ anantāṃ ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1734: RV_7,104.18a vi tiṣṭhadhvam maruto vikṣv icchata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭana |
GV01rv_hn07u:1735: RV_7,104.18c vayo ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1736: RV_7,104.19a pra vartaya divo aśmānam indra somaśitam maghavan saṃ śiśādhi
GV01rv_hn07u:1737: RV_7,104.19c prāktād apāktād adharād udaktād abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1738: RV_7,104.20a eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1739: RV_7,104.20c śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1740: RV_7,104.21a indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām
GV01rv_hn07u:1741: RV_7,104.21c abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanam pātreva bhindan sata eti rakṣasaḥ ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1742: RV_7,104.22a ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum |
GV01rv_hn07u:1743: RV_7,104.22c suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1744: RV_7,104.23a mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatām apocchatu mithunā yā
GV01rv_hn07u:1746: RV_7,104.23c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1747: RV_7,104.24a indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām |
GV01rv_hn07u:1748: RV_7,104.24c vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam ||
GV01rv_hn07u:1749: RV_7,104.25a prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraś ca soma jāgṛtam |
GV01rv_hn07u:1750: RV_7,104.25c rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ ||
